1295.instructions: Pour ingredients into glass (usually a double shot glass.) Drink quickly.
1295.name: Vulcan Mind Meld

1608.instructions: Mix the vodka, Kahlua and Bailey's and pour over ice. Pour the Creme de menthe down the center of the glass. Looks gross, but tastes delicious!
1608.name: Dirty Girl Scout

1602.instructions: Combine all ingredients and shake with ice. Serve in 140ml martini glass. Garnish with strawberries marinated in Cointreau and Monin Passionfruit syrup and a pineapple leaf.
1602.name: Mellon Collie and The Infinite Gladness

1270.instructions: Mix the Captain Morgan, Mountain Dew, and sugar in one class. Pour the fire water into a shot glass. Take the shot, then follow it with the mixed drink. Make sure to drink the mixed drink quickly
1270.name: Hillinator

1226.instructions: Stir the 1 1/4 cups water and sugar over medium heat until sugar is dissolved.Bring to boil and boil for 5 mins. Cool pour into screw top jar and chill over night . Just before serving pour into a punch bowl all except ginger ale Now pour ginger ale now put in the fruit.
1226.name: Punch #2

1305.instructions: Serve well mixed over ice. Yo can add 1 part milk if desired.
1305.name: Nutty Russian

1378.instructions: Rim tall glass with celery salt, fill with ice and ingredients. Garnish with a celery stick, straw, and lime.
1378.name: Bloody Caesar

1328.instructions: Mix hot chocolate according to instructions in a 12 oz. glass or larger and add liquors...top with whipped cream...beware!!!!! These sneak up on you!!!!
1328.name: Mogul Masher

1427.instructions: Pour the Kurant into a highball glass full of ice. Add some Rose's lime (how much depends on individual taste). Fill up with Sprite.
1427.name: Ragnar #2

1228.instructions: Combine all ingredients and stir until sugar is disolved. Store in large bottles for 22 days, then put in gift bottles and seal.
1228.name: Raspberry Cordial

1445.instructions: Mix all the liquid ingredients first. Then at the very last add whipped cream and on the top of this add the different fruit parts.
1445.name: Galapagos

1609.instructions: Add above ingrediants in a blender. Blend on high until the ice is crushed. Enjoy!
1609.name: Spunky Monkey

1254.instructions: Pour Tabasco into bottom of shot glass and fill with tequila.
1254.name: Brave Bull Shooter

1694.instructions: In a ice filled mixing cup add all ingredients and shake well, pour into cocktail glass, garnish with berries in season
1694.name: Nuts and Berries #1

1233.instructions: Mix wine, sugar and fruit, and let sit in the fridge for 18-24 hours. The mixture will have a somewhat syrupy consistency. Before serving stir in brandy and cut the mixture with soda water until it have a thinner, more wine like consistency. Serve from a pitcher in wine glasses.
1233.name: Sangria - The World's Best

1657.instructions: Pour all ingredients into pint glass.
1657.name: Five dollar shake

1230.instructions: Mix all together in a pitcher and refrigerate. Add cloves and cinnamon sticks to taste. Serve in wine glasses.
1230.name: Sangria #1

1320.instructions: Add ingredients and mix in blender.
1320.name: Owen's Grandmother's Revenge

1631.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake well and pour into Cocktail glasses.
1631.name: Southern Sunrise

1533.instructions: Pour Beer into a highball glass, add orange juice til desired color
1533.name: Poor Man's Mommosa

1701.instructions: With the shot glass you pour half a glass with Tequila and the other half with 7-up. Take the glass already filled with both drinks, take it with palm holding the top of the glass (so the liquid would not come out) and you hit to the table so it will stirr, and you drink the whole.
1701.name: Muppet

1515.instructions: Mix it and serve with ice
1515.name: Mike Tyson

1327.instructions: Shake well and serve in a cocktail glass.
1327.name: Pisco Sour

1675.instructions: Place 3/4 oz. of whiskey in an old-fashioned glass. Add 2.5 oz. of optinally warmed Canadian Apple Cider. If served cold, crushed ice is optional.
1675.name: Canadian Funky Electric Cider

1618.instructions: Mix all ingredients except Chambord. Chill and strain mixture into a martini glass. Float Chambord to the bottom of the glass.
1618.name: Wet Dream

1396.instructions: Mix all together, serve in a Collins glass over ice.
1396.name: Chocolate Toasted Almond

1494.instructions: Fill shot glass with whiskey. Drop full shot glass into mug o' beer. Drink immediately, enjoy.
1494.name: Boilermaker

1271.instructions: Fill tall rocks glass or tumbler with ice. Add tequila and triple sec, followed by O.J. and cranberry. Add blue curacao. DO NOT MIX. Garnish with lemon or cherry if desired.
1271.name: Tequila Mockingbird

1661.instructions: Shake with plenty of ice, pour into Hurricaine glasses. Grind a moderate amount of green cardomom on top. (This is extremely important, and gives the drink it's characteristic purfume.) Garnish with fruit, a frilly umbrella, etc.
1661.name: Iron Hindu

1506.instructions: Mix it and wait for the effects. Its called a liquid cocaine. Because it's expensive and once you try it your hooked.
1506.name: Liquid cocaine 8 ball

1290.instructions: Pour Curacao over ice in a tumbler. Add Raspberry cordial and Lemonade at the same time so that the combined effect mixes the drink. Consume!!! The drink is meant to taste like the lollies called Fruit Tingles, and it succeeds very well in this..
1290.name: Fruit Tingle

1571.instructions: Fill a tall glass completely with ice cubes. Mix the ingredients into the glass and serve with a slice of lemon put on the glass. It is a very simple drink, but never the less it is very deliscious - especially in the summertime.
1571.name: Bacardi Gold & Cola

1659.instructions: Pour Butterscotch Schnapps halfway in shot glass. Pour Cream Whiskey down the side of the glass to fill the shot the rest of the way . Object is to float the Irish Cream on the Schnapps
1659.name: Buttery Nipple #2

1225.instructions: Mix first 3 ingredients ahead of time. Add soda water when you are ready to serve it. Serve over ice. You can add more soda water to suit your taste.
1225.name: Punch #1

1604.instructions: Layer in normal shot glass. Can be lit and shot through straw.
1604.name: Gorilla's Puke

1607.instructions: mix equal parts in pony glass-tastes just like a jelly bean!
1607.name: Jelly Bean

1231.instructions: Peel the apples and cut into small cubes. Peel the oranges, take out the pips, and cut into small cubes. Warm the orange juice, the sugar and the mandarin peels until the sugar dissolves. Mix all the ingredients in a pitcher, except the ice and the soda which you add just before serving. Serve in wine glsses.
1231.name: Sangria #2

1649.instructions: Mix vodkas in a cocktail shaker over ice. Strain into shot glasses. Squeeze juice from the lemon wedge into each glass.
1649.name: Pineberry

1326.instructions: It's basiclly the same as the Cuba Libre but instead of Rum it has Pisco. You can use not only Coca-Cola, instead you can add almost any kind of other soda drinks (sprite, fanta, etc.)
1326.name: Pisco

1400.instructions: Pour liqour in order listed and layer. Serve and shoot
1400.name: D.O.A.

1333.instructions: Pour both ingredients into 1 ounce shot glass Take as a beer chaser when arriving late at the bar
1333.name: Sicilian Kiss

1665.instructions: to consume: place sugar on lemon, place in mouth and take shot, then bite down on lemon -enjoy sweet/tart flavor as vodka goes down! YummY!
1665.name: Lemon Drop #1

1441.instructions: Build in highball glass with lots of ice Garnish with slice of orange and cocktail cherry.
1441.name: Bingo

1592.instructions: Stir liquids with ice then strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with celery and cucumber. Serve immediately.
1592.name: Screaming Viking

1555.instructions: Mix the milk and the Bailys, add some ice, and drink it in a whiskeyglass.
1555.name: Felix's feast

1574.instructions: Combine and blend all four ingredients and serve in a highball glass with a lime garnish.
1574.name: Georgian Sunrise

1322.instructions: Serve in a chilled cocktail glass. Lemon and sugar the rim. Stir and Strain.
1322.name: New York Lemonade

1447.instructions: Stir all ingrediences with ice cubes and drink in a real Grogg-glass to get the wanted and expected effect. Let the lingonberry jam chill before mixing and make sure the vodka is below freezing to get a real lingonberry taste. One can us a straw if needed.
1447.name: Vodkalenius

1278.instructions: Fill blender about 3/4 with ice-cream (not solid). Add 2 oz of amaretto and kahlua and 3 oz of bailey's. Blend. Drink.
1278.name: Creamy punani

1670.instructions: Fill half beer glass with beer. Fill other half with 7-UP soda (If you have the patience, pour a little of one, then a little of the other, until the glass is full). Fill a shot glass with Melon liqueur. Drop entire shot glass into glass of beer. Immediately drink entire pint of beer with shot glass still inside (do not swallow the shot glass).
1670.name: Mountain Dew #1

1402.instructions: you should never drink one of these.
1402.name: Estonian Forest-fire

1524.instructions: Mix JD and Vodka together with Kahlua. Heat over medium flame Bailey's, Tequila, and Rum. Mix all together with tomato juice and top with grenadine. Garnish with a stalk of celery and green onion. Enjoy!!!
1524.name: The Crying Game

1244.instructions: Beat egg whites to a stiff froth. Separately beat egg yolks until light in color, gradually add the powdered sugar and spices. Fold yolk mixture into whites. Divide mixture between four 8 oz. mugs. Add 1/2 shot brandy and 1 shot rum to each mug, fill with hot beverage. Stir well and top with nutmeg.
1244.name: Tom and Jerry Punch

1645.instructions: Put Amaretto in bottom of shot glass, top with Rum. Pour Beer into glass. Light shot, pick up shot by the sides and drop entire shot glass (bottom first) into beer. When bottom of shot glass hits bottom of beer glass chug (the beer will put out the flame).
1645.name: Flaming Dr. Pepper (alternative)

1686.instructions: Pour schapps into cordial glass then gently float Bailey's on top. Drip grenadine into glass. It is very important to drip the grenadine one drop at a time for maximum effect.
1686.name: Bloody Brain

1323.instructions: Same as Caipirinha but instead of cachaca you add WHITE RUM. It's great!!!!!!!!
1323.name: Caipirissima

1236.instructions: Combine peach nectar, orange juice and brown sugar in a large saucepan. Tie cinnamon and cloves in a small cheesecloth bag. Drop into saucepan. Heat slowly, stirring constantly, until sugar dissolves. Simmer 10 minutes. Stir in lime juice. Serve in hot mugs.
1236.name: Spiced Peach Punch

1426.instructions: Pour the jigger of Midori first. Then, very gingerly, slowly pour the Irish Cream on top of the Midori. If done properly, the Irish Cream will sit on top of the Midori without mixing. Repeat the procedure with the Stoli over the Irish Cream. This will give you a very attractive three layer drink. Optional - add a teaspoon or so of Bacardi 151 on the top of the drink. Then, light the 151 and let burn for 5-10 seconds. Put out with a napkin. Shoot the drink and enjoy!
1426.name: Extraterrestrial

1250.instructions: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lime juice, dip rim in salt. Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into the salt-rimmed glass, and serve.
1250.name: Margarita

1313.instructions: Mix all ingredients together. Pour into a tall, narrow glass. Add a grain of salt.
1313.name: Romulan Ale

1277.instructions: Simply pour over ice into a tall glass.
1277.name: Chocolate Paradise

1676.instructions: Poor shots into glass. Fill with Dr. Pepper or Mt. Dew and mix. Enjoy.
1676.name: The Boiling Panther

1311.instructions: Shake after poured, add a cherry and slice of orange
1311.name: Long Island Sunset

1302.instructions: Pour Amaretto into shot glass, top with whip cream. Drink with hands behind back in one smooth motion
1302.name: Blow Job #1

1264.instructions: Pour into shaker chill, and gently swirl together.
1264.name: Mexican Mouthwash

1453.instructions: In a Highball glass with ice, pour three shots of Rum (preferably Bacardi) one shot of Kahlua, a shot of ginger ale and fill the rest of the glass with milk, (Homo or 2%, never SKIM!) Stir. That's It! Enjoy
1453.name: Dambuster

1456.instructions: Fill a Collins glass with crushed ice. Pour the spirits and the juice over the ice. Add cola until the drink becomes tea coloured.
1456.name: Long Island Iced Tea #3

1440.instructions: Pour all over ice -- shake and strain into a large shot glass.
1440.name: Hawaiin Punch from Hell

1593.instructions: Pour liquids into a strainer glass with 4-6 ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with cherries.
1593.name: Wong Tong Cocktail

1388.instructions: Pour rum, lemon juice, lime juice, and grenadine in a short collins glass. Shake or stir, then add splash of soda.
1388.name: Shark's tooth

1624.instructions: Fill blender about 1/4 full with ice. Add all ingredients to blender. Blend to a smooth consistency. Serve in either a hurricane glass or a tall glass or goblet. Garnish with a pineapple spear is optional.
1624.name: Andrea's Colada Collision

1569.instructions: Just mix them up however you want.
1569.name: Lil' Johnson

1658.instructions: Shake it with ice, and serve it in a cocktail glass.
1658.name: Neon Ghost

1368.instructions: Pour both into glass and keep away from open flames!!
1368.name: Green Hell

1496.instructions: Mix in a shaker 1/4 filled with ice and pour into liberal shot glasses.
1496.name: Mad Cow

1283.instructions: Fill two or more shooter 1 oz. shooter glasses with the kahlua and vodka and place a slice of orange on the top of each glass. Put the Sambuca in a wine glass and light. Pour the lit Sambuca on the shooters below and let burn for a short time in front of your bedazzled guests. Blow out the fire and instruct the drinkers of the shooters to drink out of the glass first and chew the Sambuca-soaked orange slice last.
1283.name: Russian Roulette

1605.instructions: Poor ingredients over ice. Shake gently. Strain into cocktail glass.
1605.name: Black Martini #1

1656.instructions: Combine in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into cocktail glass.
1656.name: Windex

1373.instructions: Mix all ingredients in glass with ice. Add cola to taste. Serve on the rocks.
1373.name: Pirate's Float

1611.instructions: Layer in order in shot glass. Drink without using your hands!!
1611.name: Patti's Blow Job

1363.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a drinkmixer with ice cubes. Pour in a highball glass and fill up with ginger ale.
1363.name: Maria's Delight

1422.instructions: layered erin first, then sambuca and then avocart(should sit in middle of other two. To drink: use a straw to suck up avocart then shot the rest and then suck fumes up through straw.
1422.name: Brainteaser

1707.instructions: pour 1 shot a vodka pour 1/2 shot of Tobasco sauce in seperate shot glass (take vodka shot immediately followed by the Tobasco shot) ***amount can be changed to liking
1707.name: Afterburner #2

1352.instructions: Served on the rocks. Pour the St. Hallvard first, then the aquavit. Add a lemon twist.
1352.name: Shimmers

1684.instructions: Chill on ice and strain into shot glass.
1684.name: Dead green frog

1698.instructions: Pour in the brandy and then the coke, biatch. Hold up the glass and say dude. Enjoy dude.
1698.name: Cherry Martinsen

1413.instructions: use 16 oz. cup, fill ice, pour in alcohol, then top with orange juice, for weaker, add more OJ.
1413.name: Ha Ha Tonka

1589.instructions: Pour scotch in iced glass and coat sides empty scotch out pour in vodka
1589.name: Silver Bullet #2

1353.instructions: Mix all ingrediants together in a pitcher. Tastes and smells non-alcoholic, but packs a wallop.
1353.name: Sip and go naked

1499.instructions: Pour Rum, Vodka, Raspberry Liqueur and Lime Juice a strainer glass. Chill with ice and strain into your shot glass. Float 151 Rum on top of shot. Throw down or ignite and throw down. (Igniting the 151 Rum will lower the alcoholic content.)
1499.name: Godhead

1566.instructions: Mix Lime Juice, then Vodka, then JD and 7-UP. Optional Grenadine dash last--pour around side of glass for effect. Serve on ice.
1566.name: The Big Johnson

1394.instructions: Using a chilled cooper mug,fill with ice. Pour ingredients over ice. Garnish with sprig of fresh mint.
1394.name: Bob's Moscow Mule

1567.instructions: Pour over ice cubes in a cordial glass. Stir and squeeze in an orange wedge. Serve.
1567.name: Cynar Cocktail

1348.instructions: With ice, shake/stir and serve in shot glasses. The original drink called for the Goldslager but I actually like it with HotDam better..
1348.name: Oatmeal Cookie

1570.instructions: Mix the o'boy n' the salt in a tall glass, add the heated milk. Put some whipped cream at the top and serve.
1570.name: Obadoba

1399.instructions: Fill glass with ice add Vodka and Mountain Dew...If drinking the Dew-Driver the way God intended (out of a Big Gulp cup) adjust ingredients appropriately...Remember to say "I only had 2 drinks!" whern retching later in the evening.
1399.name: Dew-Driver

1474.instructions: Combine all ingrdients. Serve over ice in a collins glass. Garnish with lime wedge and maraschino cherry.
1474.name: Planter's Punch

1359.instructions: In a lowball glass combine the two and stir.
1359.name: Dreamsicle #1

1553.instructions: Mix all three in a shooter! Slight burn on the way down is normal, just enjoy it.
1553.name: StumbleFuck

1644.instructions: Mix all indredients in a blender with enough ice to freeze. Serve in a tall glass with a lime twist garnish
1644.name: Midori Sour - Frozen

1429.instructions: Pour all over ice in large cooler. Then climmb the pporchs.
1429.name: Porch Climber

1495.instructions: In large ice filled glass, pour vodka, then tea. Add a lemon wedge for garnish. Surprisingly refreshing.
1495.name: Ice Pick #2

1623.instructions: 1. Pour Kahlua into shot glass to about 1/2 full. 2. Using a spoon(inverted), slowly pour in the Peppermint Schnapps until glass is about 3/4 full. Done correctly, the Schnapps will flow under the Kahlua for a clear layer. 3. Again using a spoon, but this time right side up, slowly top off the glass with a layer of Bailey's. Be careful to place the spoon right at the top of the Kahlua layer and to raise it as the glass fills up. Done correctly, this will provide a layer of Bailey's floating over the Kahlua. 4. Toss it down all at once for something like a Peppermint Pattie, WITH A BANG!!! NOTE: Best if all ingredients are chilled
1623.name: After Five

1541.instructions: Blend with a scoop of ice
1541.name: Smooth Operator

1256.instructions: Served over ice in a tall glass with a popped cherry (can add more popped cherries if in the mood)!
1256.name: Popped cherry

1588.instructions: Shake schnapps and vodka together until well-mixed. Add crushed ice, shake lightly, then pour to shot glasses.
1588.name: Blue PolarBear

1329.instructions: Pour ingredients into shot glass and serve.
1329.name: Prairie Fire #2

1595.instructions: Fill tall glass with ice cubes. Add rum. Rub cut edge of lime on rim of glass then squeeze juice into glass. Fill with Coca-Cola. Garnish with lime slice. Enjoy!
1595.name: Cuba Libra

1414.instructions: Pour ingredients into a pint glass. Drink. Fall over.
1414.name: Snake Bite (UK)

1700.instructions: Pour Orange curacao into champagne flute, add Dark rum, top off with Champagne, I recommend Brut
1700.name: French Pirate

1376.instructions: Mix in order: rum, drop, Kaula, drop
1376.name: Captain Louie

1419.instructions: After the first 1/2 oz drop just a tiny bit of Bailey's on top.
1419.name: Booger

1655.instructions: Mix everything in a highballglas and add some ice.
1655.name: Vit Ryss

1674.instructions: Pour into shot glass and shoot it back.
1674.name: Lloyd Special

1336.instructions: Mix the water and rum, add powdered lemonade mix to taste. Stir and enjoy!
1336.name: The Shanaynay

1416.instructions: Mix Kahlua and Creme de Banana in a shaker with ice. Strain into a shot glass. Float the 151 on top.
1416.name: Puerto Rican Monkey Fuck

1513.instructions: Mix juices and alcohol in mixing tin, flash blend, and pour over ice in a 23 oz. squall glass and float Bacardi 151 rum. Garnish with an orange flag and umbrella.
1513.name: Key Largo Kooler

1666.instructions: Mix alcoholic ingredients and kiwi in blender, then add the food coloring and stir. Pour into glass and top with cherry.
1666.name: Sex under the bleachers with a KU cheerleader

1346.instructions: Mix the Vodka with the cider or the wine. Drop the fruit from a height of at least 3 feet. Pour the sprite and the Ginger Ale with the rest Carefully pour the Pisang Ambon into the punch. Enjoy!
1346.name: Tuve Nightmare

1562.instructions: Stir Cranberry, amaretto, sour mix. Pour into a frosted highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with club soda, add twist of lime. Garnish with a wedge of lime.
1562.name: Pussy Paws

1247.instructions: Simmer the non-alcoholic ingredients together for 1-2 hours, then add the wine and rum about 10 minutes before serving (hot).
1247.name: Wassail #2

1408.instructions: Pour vodka over ice into highball glass. Add mixers. May be garnished with a wedge of lime.
1408.name: Seabreeze

1324.instructions: Put shot in then add Soda
1324.name: Captain Do

1501.instructions: For the shooter you mix all ingredients together over ice. For the shot you decrease the Pineapple Juice to 1 ct. Chill and then strain.
1501.name: Sex on the Beach #2

1646.instructions: Put all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake, strain into a collin's glass. Garnish with an orange slice.
1646.name: Flaming Jesse or Tropical SunShine

1708.instructions: Pour 2 cl of gin (no special gin required) in a glass. Add 2 cl of Malibu. On top of that, enough of Rose'e lime juice to match the taste of Malibu. Fill up with lemonade. Add some ice and a straw.
1708.name: Partymeister

1632.instructions: Fill a mixer with ice and add Baileys, Kahlua, Goldshlager, and cream. Shake for 5 seconds and Strain into a double rocks glass filled with ice. Add chilled coffee Stir and enjoy!
1632.name: Midnight Manx

1654.instructions: Layer liquors in order listed from top to bottom in shot glass. Drink all at once.
1654.name: Modified Duck Fart

1361.instructions: Fill pint glass half full with Bass. Next pour Guiness over a spoon slowly until glass is full. If done correctly the Guiness will stay on top and the Bass on bottom hence the name Black & Tan.
1361.name: Black & Tan

1612.instructions: Add light rum, dark rum, spiced rum, and malibu rum to ice filled glass. Mix in pineapple juice and blue curacao. Float 151 rum on top.
1612.name: Bahama Todd

1578.instructions: Pour over ice in a highball glass. Top with a splash of grenadine.
1578.name: Roswell

1683.instructions: fill glass with ice. pour butterscotch scnapps and bailey's into glass. fill with milk. shake. serve with sip straw.
1683.name: Butterfinger

1282.instructions: Put banana and liquer into blender until it is a thick paste then add bailey's to taste and pina colada mix and rum. Blend well then add ice blend untill smooth and enjoy!
1282.name: Bailey's Banana Colada (bbc)

1319.instructions: In a shot glass add 1/3 Kahlua first. Then 1/3 Miduri, topping it off with a 1/3 bailey's irish cream
1319.name: Quick F**K

1558.instructions: Put Kahlua on the bottom over ice. Then add milk Then add Rye. Stir before drinking.
1558.name: Sneaky Pete

1253.instructions: In a regular-sized shot glass, layer, with a spoon or cherry, the grenadine , the Kahlua , then the Bailey's Irish cream in equal portions. It goes down really smooth ,and you don't even need a chaser. It tastes just like chocolate milk.(Really!)
1253.name: Bruce's Puce

1382.instructions: Serve as a shot or on the rocks.
1382.name: Small Bomb

1387.instructions: In a LARGE pitcher, pour in 3 cans of beer, then the vodka and lemonade, then the last 3 beers. Mix gently and pour into a tall glass over ice. It sounds horrible, but the beer taste is hidden. It tastes like lemonade!
1387.name: Strip and Go Naked

1423.instructions: Pour shot of Tuaca. Thoroughly drench the lime in bitters, then coat in powdered sugar. Drink shot, bite into lime, experience a veritable explosion of flavor.
1423.name: Cartwheel

1576.instructions: Mix all three ingredients in a strainer with ice, serve chilled
1576.name: Jamaican Dust

1703.instructions: Pour contents in shaker over ice and shake well. Pour into glass. This is a big shooter so you have to use a small rocks glass.
1703.name: Four Horsemen

1318.instructions: Shake a tall glass with ice cubes and Angostura, coating the inside of the glass. Por the vodka onto this, add 1 slice of lime and squeeze juice out of remainder, mix with tonic, stir and voila you have a Long Vodka
1318.name: Long vodka

1401.instructions: Ice tall glass, follow ingredients. Top off with cranberry juice. Garnish with lime.
1401.name: Mount Red

1620.instructions: Fill glass with ice add liquor, orange juice, and sour mix. shake well add 1 oz of 7 up to the top.
1620.name: Fishbone

1711.instructions: Always put ice in glass first to cool the mixers when they are poured.
1711.name: Ekatherina Andreevna

1232.instructions: Dissolve the sugar in hot water and cool. Peel the citrus fruits and break into wedges. Mix the wine, sugar syrup, fruit, and Fresca in a pitcher and put in the fridge for a few hours. Serve in tall glasses with a straw.
1232.name: Sweet Sangria

1298.instructions: Take shot of Bailey's. With Bailey's in your mouth take shot of lime juice. Mix rapidly in mouth by shaking head vigorously. Swallow before it congeals totally.
1298.name: Cement Mixer

1334.instructions: Pour two ounces of whiskey and ounce of vodka on ice into a regular glass. Add three ounces of lemon-lime soda and a dash of orange juice. Serve and enjoy
1334.name: Mister Wu

1685.instructions: shake all ingredients adding less or more orange juice for you preferance of taste. serve in shot glass.
1685.name: Hot Damn

1585.instructions: Shake and strain. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.
1585.name: Amaretto Sour

1622.instructions: This is a Winter drink which can only be consumed outdoors preferbly in an alpine environment. It is should be consumed in small swigs from a French Canteen type of devide and only after a epic day of skiing...Why yes it's strong but you'll be the better for it.
1622.name: Loud-Mouth

1432.instructions: Add all ingredients into a mixing tin with ice. Place mixing glass on top. Shake vigorously. Spin tin & glass on the palm of hand. Throw behind your back and catch with opposite hand. Repeat in various ways until your customers or guests are mystified. Serve in collins with out a garnish.
1432.name: Mike Samm's Purple Passionate Punch

1483.instructions: Pour Vodka and Cranberry Juice into a High Ball glass over ice. Stir well, add the wedge of lime, and serve.
1483.name: Cape Codder

1389.instructions: pour the peach schnapps into the shot glass, almost to the top. Slowly, and gently layer the Bailey's in on the side of the glass, to almost full. Add a touch of grenidine,down the middle and a touch of cherry brandy down the middle.
1389.name: Brain Tumor

1446.instructions: Combine and shake well with ice and strain into a shot glass.
1446.name: Surfer on Acid

1484.instructions: Mix with ice. Serve cold. [Our studies show this drink to taste quite foul at the beginning of the evening but rather refreshing after several other drinks have been consumed.]
1484.name: Peppermint Beach

1491.instructions: In a tall thin glass, crush part of the mint with a fork to coat the inside. Add the sugar and lemon juice and stir thoroughly. Top with ice. Add rum and mix. Top off with the club soda (or seltzer). Add a lemon slice and the remaining mint. Serves one.
1491.name: Mojito #2

1691.instructions: Add the orange juice in the glass so it fills it about 1/3. Then take a napkin and put it over the glass pushing it down toward the juice. Push napkin down as far as it can go without touching the juice. Next pour the vodka very slowly so it dribbles on top of the juice. This will create a layer of vodka that lays on top of the juice because of the different densities of the liquids.
1691.name: Machine

1466.instructions: Used crushed ice. Can be made in anysizefrom punchbowl to personal serving.
1466.name: Snitchee's Cider

1260.instructions: Fill a blender 1/2 full (or 1/2 empty) with ice. Fill 1/4 of the blender with vodka. Fill 1/2 with pine-orange-banana fruit juice. Fill the rest with fresh strawberries, and about 4 tsp. sugar. Blend, serve with an orange slice.
1260.name: Reggae Ambassador

1251.instructions: Take one part vodka into the glass, pour one part lime in the same glass. Then you take two parts of 7-up or sprite. Mix this together with a straw or something like that. Ice is recommended.
1251.name: Polarbear #1

1255.instructions: Cover bottom of shot glass with Tabasco Sauce and then fill with half Firewater and half Absolut Peppar.
1255.name: Fahrenheit 5000

1536.instructions: Pour vodka in glass then the rest, stir well. By the way for best results add Kiwi juice concentrate last
1536.name: Albysjun

1366.instructions: Mix it all together on ice, what else?
1366.name: Go Girl!

1573.instructions: Mix Shake Can be made as an up cocktail or on the rocks
1573.name: Pink Lemonade

1693.instructions: Put all into a Shot Glass
1693.name: Joe Cocker

1551.instructions: Just layer chilled Jagermeister on top of sambuca
1551.name: Liquid Asphault

1384.instructions: Put the milk in the bottom, pour the Liquer on top and add the dash of amaretto. Do not mix. SLAM IT!
1384.name: Chocolate Milk

1621.instructions: layer in a shot glass, Jimmy, Jack, then Johnnie
1621.name: Three Wise Men

1315.instructions: Pour into a large glass with ice and stir. Add a little cranberry juice to taste.
1315.name: Kool-Aid Shot

1449.instructions: Squeeze lime wedge in tall glass with ice. Add other ingredients. Sugar is optional.
1449.name: Mai Tai, Michael's Ultimate

1587.instructions: pour over ice in regular glass. Add pineapple and orange juice to taste. Sort of like a regular screwdriver except with a tropical twist! Can also use orange-strawberry juice or any kind of funky fruit combination!
1587.name: Hawaiian Screw

1321.instructions: Add Amaretto, Bacardi, and vodka. Mix in the Dr. Pepper and beer

1248.instructions: Mix wine and soft drink. Pour into glass. Add ice.

1355.instructions: Mix it all in a glass 1/4 full of ice...

1273.instructions: Mix cofee and chilled Irish Cream and half & half. Add sugar and stir. Serve hot in an Irish coffee cup.

1405.instructions: In a shaker, half filled with crushed ice, combine Tequila and Apfelkorn. Shake well. Strain into a high-ball glass filled with a few icecubes. Fill up with orangejuice. Serve with salt and lemon as a usual Tequila shot. The first German Hooker was served under our graduation week in june 1994. Long live, Anders Hansson!! The technician class of 1994 Brinellskolan, Fagersta, SWEDEN
1405.name: German Hooker (Die Deutsche Nutte)

1486.instructions: Pour the Baccardi into the shot glass. Add the Margarita mix. Top it with lemon juice and shoot it.

1465.instructions: Pour schnapps into a large shot glass (the measurements may be off a bit, you can experiment). Slowly pour irish cream into schnapps so that it basically forms a "brain" in "formaldihide". Finally, dribble the grenadine (dribbling onto a spoon then into the schnapps helps) directly into the center of the irish cream mass . As the grenadine amount slowly increases it will eventually burst through the irish cream creating a "hemoraging" "brain".

1673.instructions: take seeds out of cardamom pods, put the seeds and the rest of the spices (1-4) in cheesecloth bag. combine 1qt port, 1qt red wine, raisins and spice bag, simmer for 15-20 minutes. add remaining port, red wine and almonds, heat through (but not hot enough to evaporate remaining alcohol). In another pan, mix sugar with 1/3 of the brandy, light brandy on fire and melt sugar. When sugar is melted add remaining brandy. Then combine with the wine/port mixture. Drink!!!

1575.instructions: Pour tequlia in a double shot glass. Then pour Tabasco in the same glass.

1235.instructions: Boil water, sugars, beer and the yellow part of the lemon's peel. Let the mixture cool down. Peel the white part of the lemon's peel carefully and cut the fruit part of the lemon in small pieces and add to sima. Disolve the yeast in a bit of sima and add to sima. Put 5-6 raisins and 1 tablespoon sugar in every bottle. Put sima in bottles and close the bottles carefully. Leave sima in a cold place for a couple of days. Sima is ready when the raisins float. Sima will keep in cold place for 1-2 weeks.

When you have all of that done take your shaker tin, fitting it on top of the glass and give it a couple of good shakes.

1851.instructions: Funny how the program wouldn't let me post this without adding mixing instructions. There are so many ways to get hold of it. You can draw it, pour it, dig for it or simply dig it, you can get it from a well, a tap, a source, a fountain, a stream, you can drink it straight up, out of your hand, from a glass, a bottle, a jar and a container. Soft water may have the disadvantage of containing only minute quantities of magnesium, whereas hard water might be bad for your favourite sweat-shirt... But all in all, NO WATER - NO LIFE. So get a life, care for your water.
1851.name: Water (the original)

2122.instructions: shake well with ice, pour strained mixture into shooter. Salute'

1890.instructions: This is the punch we serve at our annual Halloween party. We use a big, black, plastic cauldron to mix this punch in. You can use any LARGE vat to concoct this wonderful drink. Add all alcohols first, then add juices. Add the Sprite just before serving. If you want... do as we do, and drop in chunks of dry-ice to create a bubbling, smoking cauldron of pure Halloweeen evil! It's safe to drink, and does not really change the taste all that much! YAHOO! GET DERAILED!

2109.instructions: Pour ingredients over ice filled glass and shake or stir to mix and then strain.

1924.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into an old fashioned glass.

1836.instructions: Pour ingredients into shot glass and slam. Enjoy!

2044.instructions: Mix vodka, whiskey and Bailey's. Add the coffea and the brown sugar. Blend.

1899.instructions: Just Mix together and drink fast !!

Garnish with a cherry and lemon and lime wheels. Stir just before drinking.

1937.instructions: Pour the vodka and anisette into the glass and top it off with orange juice.

2096.instructions: Mix in highball glass. Stirr. Garnish with slice of kiwi.

2145.instructions: Mix with ice and strain in tall shot glass.

2157.instructions: Blend with ice and strained in to the cocktail glass and garnish whith a slice of lime and red cherry.

2066.instructions: Float schnapps on top of Rumple and enjoy!

1724.instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into chilled cocktail or margarita glass.

1959.instructions: Mix. Pretend it's a martini. Plastic glasses are the best for this beast.
1959.name: Dick Deming Martini

1720.instructions: Pour ingredients together into glass, over ice. Mix well. Serve with lime and salted glass if desired.
1720.name: Tequillya

1748.instructions: In the Shot Glass, layer equal parts of each Liquer, the Grenadine on the bottom, the Kahlua in the middle, and the Grand Marnier on top. This creates red, Black, and Gold Layers.
1748.name: Sinfonian

1922.instructions: Fill shot glass with schnapps. Fill tumbler about 3/4 full of beer. Place filled shot glass upright in filled tumbler. Beer should be just short of covering top of shot glass. Just before drinking, cover entire drink with hand and slam on table or bar. Drink all at once.
1922.name: Root Beer Barrel

2107.instructions: pour into a tall glass over ice, shake to mix all ingredients well, garnish with a cherry or an orange slice if you so desire
2107.name: Smooch

1971.instructions: Throw it all together and have fun. Adjust sour mix for a stiffer or weaker drink.
1971.name: YoYo Blow Out

1761.instructions: Mix 1/2 oz Amaretto with 1/2 oz Southern Comfort. Drop into glass of 2 oz orange juice mixed with 2 oz 7-up.
1761.name: Gladiator

1858.instructions: Fill glass with ice Add Amaretto Add splash beer Add sweet & sour Top with sprite Stir lightly
1858.name: Ozone

2010.instructions: combine ingredients in mug and stir until fizzy
2010.name: Matty's Magic Mixture

2117.instructions: Dissolve jello with 1 cup boiling water, add 1 cup vodka and srir, pour into shot glasses, ice trays, or in 1 oz plastic cups found at party supply stores (they even have little lids for them), chill until firm. Each person can use a knife or their tongue to loosen the edges of the jello and then suck them down. If you use the 1 oz plastic cups and lids you can serve them by placing all of the cups in a large bowl filled with ice...they will stay cold longer, and they look really festive! * Try making an assortment using several flavors of jello!
2117.name: Jan's Jello Shots

1907.instructions: Mix, pour over ice and top up with Bitter Lemon.
1907.name: Absolut Evergreen

1913.instructions: chill and strain into a shot glass
1913.name: Sacrilicious

1885.instructions: Fill shaker cup with ice. Pour in all ingredients. Shake and strain into shooter glass of preference.
1885.name: Stardust

1969.instructions: Put ice in glass Pour in vodka Add splash of Sour Mix Half fill with cola Half fill with 7-Up Roll drink to remove fizz Drink!
1969.name: Bambi's Iced Tea

1961.instructions: There are many good cherry liqueurs you can use, but I prefere Heering. Add one share of the liqueur. Then you add one share of Soda. For a sour sling use Tonic (most people prefer the drink without Tonic). Afterwards you fill the glass with Orange Juice and ice cubes.
1961.name: Darkwood Sling

1839.instructions: Pour orange juice over 3 cubes ice in a highball glass add Southern Comfort and stir lightly
1839.name: Comfort Driver

1747.instructions: Straight out of the freezer, pour into a double shot glass the vodka, then Jagermeister, then Goldschlager.
1747.name: The Triple

2065.instructions: Float Goldschlager on top of Rumple and enjoy!
2065.name: Gold Baron

1900.instructions: Shake Absolut Kurant, Midori, and Cranberry juice in shaker with ice: Strain into rocks glass: Splash of seven on top.Absolut Sex.
1900.name: Absolut Sex

2001.instructions: mix in shaker over ice...strain into glass(es)
2001.name: Twinkle My Lights

1774.instructions: Pour both shots into one shot glass, straight up!
1774.name: The Jack Hammer

1946.instructions: Put double of Creme de Menthe in a 10-12 oz (300-350ml) glass and fill to top with Ginger Ale, Tonic, or Soda Water.
1946.name: Scope

2004.instructions: put alchohol in shot glass, drop strawberry into glass, then try and make cream float on top.
2004.name: Spider's Web

2056.instructions: Mix it all over ice, strain into shot glass.
2056.name: Red Snapper #2

1932.instructions: Mix all ingredients except lime in a cocktail shaker, then shake, and pour into glass. Add lime.
1932.name: Fuzzy Ethan

1979.instructions: Add 1.5 oz. Absolut Vodka to 10 oz. cocktail glass filled with ice, top off with Coka-Cola.
1979.name: Charlie Coke

2022.instructions: Pour in Rum and then triple sec. Next pour in OJ and Pinapple. Grab that Gary.
2022.name: Gary's Poison

2105.instructions: Add 1/3 rum,1/3 vodka , and combine coca-cola and orange juice to fill glass. Add ice if you have room!
2105.name: The Piledriver

2128.instructions: Pour each ingredient into the shot glass, in this order: Rumple Minze, Jagermeister, Jose Cuervo Gold Tequila, then Bacardi 151 Rum. No need to mix, it mixes fine in this order.
2128.name: Passed Out Naked on the Bathroom Floor

2158.instructions: Pour tequila into shot glass. Next pour in Mountain Dew. Hold your hand over the top of the glass and slam it down. The shot will change color. Take the shot.
2158.name: Tequila Slammer

2008.instructions: Mix in blender until smooth. Garnish with slice of orange.
2008.name: Sun Shake

2007.instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender. Mix until smooth. Garnish with fresh of frozen berries.
2007.name: Pink Panther Shake

1753.instructions: Fill one shooter with Tequila. Take a second shot glass and fill it with clamato. Then add a couple drops of tabasco and worchestershire sauce. Shoot the tequila and chase it with the second shot. Enjoy!
1753.name: Sangrita

2213.instructions: Poyr Bailey's and Grand Marnier into mug. Add espress. Serve it hot with lots of cream and sprinkle with chocolate.
2213.name: Hot Dick

1905.instructions: Put all the ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and shake it well. Serve in a red wine glass and add in the top a bit of powdered cinnamon .
1905.name: Vaina

1955.instructions: Fill a pint glass with ice. Add one shot each of Bacardi Black Rum and Seagram's Extra Dry Gin. Add a splash of soda water and fill the rest of the glass with sweet & sour mix.
1955.name: The District III

2027.instructions: Small shaker with ice add ingredients stir strain into shot glass
2027.name: Grape Crush

2150.instructions: Add your GM and then add your coffee.
2150.name: Talos Coffee

2055.instructions: Pour Kahlua in shot glass then with a spoon slowly pour Irish Cream into the shot glass on top of the Kahlua then pour the 151 Rum with the Spoon slowly on top of the Irish Cream then light on fire.. Blow out Flame Before Drinking!
2055.name: Lighthouse

1848.instructions: Mix all together in hurricane glass. Shake well. Garnish-orange flag
1848.name: All Night Long

1737.instructions: Blend the Southern Comfort, cranberry juice, and ice in a blender. Pour and serve.
1737.name: Cape Cod Crush

2206.instructions: Layer 3/4 oz. of Godet on top of 3/4 oz. of Creme de Noyaux. Serve in a cordial or shot glass
2206.name: Cherry Bon Bon

1764.instructions: Mix equal parts Curacao and Vodka and and O.J for a Light Green color. Erin Go Bragh!!
1764.name: Shamrocks

2084.instructions: Mix all the ingredients, except for the 151 rum in a tin glass or shaker. Steam the snifter, using the 1/2oz. of 151 lighting it, until it consumes itself. After that pour the content of the shaker in the hot snifter. It will create a really good smelling cloud of smoke, that it's what distinguish this coktail.
2084.name: Caribbean Smoked Torch

2178.instructions: Just pour the vodka and the chocolate syrup together in a glass. Shake well. Then add the mixture of crushed ice and strawberries and voila'.
2178.name: Fairytale

2075.instructions: Blend banana, coconut cream, and pineapple juice in blender and set aside. In bottom of hurricane glass, stir together both rums and strawberries. Pour banana/coconut/pineapple mix into glass slowly. The strawberry/rum mix should creep up the sides of the glass to make a wonderful looking (and tasting) summertime cocktail!
2075.name: Lava Flow

2166.instructions: Add the Everclear first and then the OJ so the OJ settles on the top. Then shoot it. Repeat.
2166.name: Demon Drop

1952.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker with ice, shake, strain into shot glass. The amount of milk is optional depending on desired potancy of shot.
1952.name: Cocaine Lady

2126.instructions: Pour vodka in medium-sized shot glass Add a mouthful of 2% milk Add a drop or two of grenadine Ice optional.
2126.name: Paul Raspberry

2205.instructions: Stir with ice and strain into a shot glass.
2205.name: Purple Haze Shooter

2074.instructions: Layer ingredients in above order in a shot glass. Light Bacardi 151 Rum, and serve.
2074.name: Concord

1825.instructions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add 1/2 oz of each liquor. Fill with 3 oz of each juice. Shake. Serve in a Hurricane or Collins glass. Garnish with fruit slices (if you have the patience). Enjoy!
1825.name: Tahitian Tea

2092.instructions: Mix in highball glass. Stirr. Garnish with slice of lemon.
2092.name: Blue Bay

2108.instructions: Pour in hard liquors first and lime juice follows. Top with beer until full. Do not stir. Enjoy!!
2108.name: Nuthugger

2076.instructions: Add cranberry juice to gin and pour into shot glass.
2076.name: Pink Gin #2

1980.instructions: Mix in the lemonade with the Bacardi Limon. If it is a good lemonade you're using you can mix as much as half & half and not be able to taste the rum.
1980.name: Cape Breton Lemonade

1847.instructions: Stir in a shotglass. Drink quickly.
1847.name: Buffalo Sweat

2139.instructions: Rinse glass with Sherry, discard Sherry. Shake gin over ice in separate glass to chill. Fill rinsed glass with ice, pour chilled gin over ice. Garnish with lemon twist (optional).
2139.name: The Drink

2015.instructions: Chill rum. Then layer. Creme de Banana first, then Bailey's and float rum on top.
2015.name: Beam Me Up Scottie Mac

1964.instructions: Basically, toss the Rum & Vodka together and stir gently. Next, pour in the orange juice . Shake well. Pour over ice.
1964.name: Brass Monkey

2140.instructions: First, pour the scotch in a shot glass, then pour the kirsch and amaretto. Add the Dubonnet rouge very carefully trying not to mix the ingredients. Finally pour the mint. Do not mix. Drink in one shot.
2140.name: Pablo's shot

2159.instructions: Combine all ingredients with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well. Strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass.
2159.name: Ankle Breaker

1939.instructions: Add ingredients to a tumbler with ice. Shake well. Pour into snifter, ice included.
1939.name: Nuts and Berries #2

1957.instructions: Pour Coke in, then orange juice, then vodka. Stir it about a bit, then add cordial. Enjoy !
1957.name: Salisbury Special

1911.instructions: Mix everything together and add some crunched ice and olives!
1911.name: Status Quo

2149.instructions: Add OJ, Cranberry juice, and Malibu into a mixing glass and pour into the highball glass.
2149.name: Coco Rush

2042.instructions: shake ingredients and pour over ice...
2042.name: Grateful Dead

1974.instructions: Put the tabasco sauce in the bottom of a shot glass, pour equal parts Absolut Peppar and Everclear 190 then add salt. Set on fire and serve.
1974.name: Inferno

2182.instructions: Shake all ingredients except coke.Poor over ice and top with coke for an extra creamy head. Serve with a straw on a sunny day.
2182.name: Hillbilly Bob's Mountaindrink

2171.instructions: Layer and stir, garnish with lemon
2171.name: Leaving Las Vegas

1817.instructions: Place one ice cube in the glass and add 1 1/2 oz of Advocaat. Fill up the glass with lemonade and decorate with a slice of lemon. Serve at once.
1817.name: Snowball

2020.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain. Serve as a shooter.
2020.name: Sex On Acid

1975.instructions: Blend ingredients for 30 seconds. Definitely refreshing for a hot summer's day !
1975.name: Bailey's Dream Shake

1730.instructions: Put all ingredients in together followed by the champagne last
1730.name: Blue Tahoe

2196.instructions: Layer in shot glass Yukon Jack, Jack Daniels and PeachTree Schnapps last
2196.name: Peach Smoothie

1968.instructions: Blend the Absolut kurant, Oregat and Frangelico in a mixer. Pour in highball glass, add 2 icecubes, fill with the cranberryjuice and sprite. Put a slice of lemon on the edge of the glass. Optional to add a dash of lime for an even fresher taste.
1968.name: Dephaekt

2119.instructions: Over ice mix equal parts of each alchohol. Top with the grapefruit juice. Shake to blend.
2119.name: Sex on the Pool Table

1754.instructions: Pour the ingredients in a shaker with ice cubes, shake, and pour in a cocktail glass.
1754.name: Coco Cognac

1940.instructions: Combine Creme de Banana, Malibu Rum, Pineapple Juice & ice in mixing tin. Shake or flash blend. Strain over ice and float Midori. Garnish with watermelon wedge.
1940.name: Coppertone Punch

2026.instructions: Hurricane glass filled with ice add ingredients shake cherry and orange garnish
2026.name: Agent Orange

1947.instructions: Fill the glass about two thirds full of Sprite. Pour in the Schnapps, then gin. Put ice in glass to cool.
1947.name: Gin Blossam

1805.instructions: Mix all ingredients together in a mixer, and then put them in a glass with all ice.
1805.name: Passion Chi-Chi

2013.instructions: Combine liquors in a blender. Add a half scoop of ice and blend. Garnish with an orange and cherry flag. So good it will melt in your mouth!!!
2013.name: Orange Push-up

2134.instructions: Start with the ice then you take the vodka then the liquor then the ginger ale
2134.name: Geting

2078.instructions: Layer all ingredients and light on fire to warm. Blow out flame and drink in one gulp.
2078.name: Feel The Burn

2189.instructions: Line rim of glass with salt & pepper. Over ice add vodka, fill with Clamato Juice then add remaining ingredients. Garnish with celery stick.
2189.name: Caesar

1744.instructions: In a high-ball glass add 0ne shot of 151 rum and then layer each if the other ingredents on top.
1744.name: Dead Dog Vomit

2124.instructions: Heat milk. Add sugar. Add Kahlua. Nutmeg on top. Sleep tight.
2124.name: Nightcap

2057.instructions: combine in sequence in shot glass, shoot!
2057.name: Satan's Revenge

2095.instructions: Mix in highball glass. Stirr. Garnish with cherries.
2095.name: Cool Coco

2049.instructions: Shake all ingredients and serve over ice. (crushed)
2049.name: Russian Quallude

2063.instructions: Stir and serve neat. Add a cherry.
2063.name: Sancho Panza

2100.instructions: Mix in shot glass in order of appearance in ingredients list.
2100.name: Joel's Pet Monkey

1776.instructions: Add all the ingredients into the glass, and stir for a moment.
1776.name: Pink Panther #2

1876.instructions: Add all liquid ingrediance into mixer. Add vanilla icecream and mix. Add more icecream till desired texture.
1876.name: Frozen Mudslide #2

1901.instructions: Just mix all in equal portions. Its good!
1901.name: Alien Secretion

1789.instructions: Serve in a Shotglass, and toss it straight down.
1789.name: Firetruck

1728.instructions: Fill the Boston shaker with all the ingridiens and a lot of icecubes, then shake untill your hands goes into hypothermia. Pour up in a highball glas and put a lemonslice on the edge.
1728.name: Fraustadt

1778.instructions: Pour in your favorite shot glass and enjoy. Ahh... so smoothe!
1778.name: The Terminator

2082.instructions: Put them all together and mix it with a lot of ice. For big parties use more of each and mix in a garbage can.
2082.name: Hunch Punch

1904.instructions: Mix the ingredients, add a couple of ice cubes. Put a slice of orange or lemon (any fruit will do!) on the rim of the glass.
1904.name: Apfel Orange

1739.instructions: Fill a Higball glass 2/3 with ice cubes. build the alcoholic and the sprite into the glass. The sour mix on top as a fizz.(shaken/mixed). Served with straw and a slice of citrus on top.
1739.name: Sweet Temptation

1721.instructions: Mix Whiskey, Bitters, and Cherry Juice in a ice-filled cocktail class, and fill the remaining class with sour. Garnish with olives or mushrooms and use a stir stick to mix and your mouth and taste buds to enjoy.
1721.name: Whiskey Sour Old-Fashioned

2136.instructions: Mix Vodka, Amaretto, Tripple Sec and a 1/2 squeeze of Lemon wedge in a shaker with ice. Shake. Squeeze remaining lemon juice into Martini glass. Pour mixture into glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.
2136.name: Lemon Splash Martini

1897.instructions: Pour the Bacardi 151 in, then the Everclear. Just put a drop of Kahlua right in the middle. Don't smell it, and take it. It should start your engines!
1897.name: Amoco Shot

1822.instructions: Drink (or throw away) one half of a 1.5 ltr. bottle of Coke. Then simply pour the wine into the bottle, slowly, so that it gets full. Do not shake the bottle, but simply turn it over a couple of times.
1822.name: Kalimocho

1935.instructions: Make fresh homemade lemonade by mixing the juice of one lemon and 8 oz. (one glass) of water. Be sure not to add sugar. Add the vodka and stir then put in the ice.
1935.name: SD Special

1986.instructions: Mix together in a double shot glass. Light on fire. Let the flames warm the concoction about 20 secs. Blow out fire. Swallow quickly. Be careful as the glass may be hot. Now lay on the ground, put your claws in the air, and "wrestle with the dragon".
1986.name: Flaming Dragon

2106.instructions: In a shot glass pour in apple brandy first, then Goldschlager, then Captain Morgan's. Shoot!
2106.name: Spiced apple

1966.instructions: Mix tequila and kahlua in a whiskey glass and serve with lotsa ice...
1966.name: Big Bull

2153.instructions: Mix all ingredients in highball with ice and shake. Garnish with orange slice and cherry.
2153.name: Goombay Smash

2209.instructions: Shake the orange juice and the grape tonic with lots of ice in a shaker. Pour it in a glass and add the 7-Up and the Vodka. Last, add some lemon and decorate with one slice of orange and one slice of lemon.
2209.name: Nystedt

2168.instructions: Shake the gin and the schnapps together in ice. Pour into glass Dribble the chocalte syrup in a circle on the bottom of the glass. (do not mix)
2168.name: Slow Painful Movement

1941.instructions: Put the ice cubes in first then add the shots in the order that they're listed.
1941.name: Fatkid on the Rocks

1751.instructions: Pour ingredients into the shot glass in the following order: - Baileys first, - Frangelico next, - Brandy on top.
1751.name: Irish Monk #2

1942.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a collins glass over ice (if a 32 oz. glass is available double all the ingredients), mix in a shaker and serve with a cherry. Should taste like the old chalky lollipops that cam on a hard plastic stem!!!!
1942.name: Sweet-tart Lollipop

1896.instructions: stir it up and shoot it down. HO! HO! HO! Tastes like christmas with a pine tree twist.
1896.name: Christmas Cheer

2088.instructions: Put into mixing glass all of above. Mix well, pour into cocktail glass.
2088.name: Gun Barrel

1982.instructions: Put in punch first, then add everclear. For added flavor, soak the fruit wedges in everclear about an hour ahead of time. Fruit wedges make excellent snack. Best served in ice chest or jantorial trash can for mass comsumption.
1982.name: Coon Dawg Punch

1800.instructions: Combine the ice, vodka and beef boullion in a mixing glass, add salt and pepper to taste. Stir. Strain into a chilled wineglass.
1800.name: Bullshot

1771.instructions: Mix Cherry Heering and vodka and pour into a ice cold glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.
1771.name: Copenheering

2198.instructions: Boil 3 cups of water then add jello. Mix jello and water until jello is completely disolved. Add the two cups of vodka and mix together. Pour mixture into plastic shot glasses and chill until firm. Then, eat away...
2198.name: Jello shots

1757.instructions: Stir the ingredients with and and pour into a well-chilled cocktail glass.
1757.name: Black and White

1879.instructions: - Put Irish Cream in large glass and microwave on HIGH power for half a minute or so. - While that's going, rim the shot glasses with sugar - Pour heated Bailey's into shot glasses and serve immediately
1879.name: Bailey's Hot Shot

1833.instructions: Mix the Rum, grapefruit juice and pineapple juice. Stir well and add ice cubes to the top for a delicious drink.
1833.name: Gumbys' Ruby Red

2210.instructions: Throw all the ingredients in a blender. Then blend till mixed. Ice-cream suggested for more milk shake like drink.
2210.name: Pensacola Bushwacker

2061.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add a cherry.
2061.name: El Presidente Cocktail #2

2012.instructions: Place ice cubes in the hurricane glass . Add the 2 HEAPING shots of Absolute Vodka (Note: You can add as many shots of Absolute as you want!) Fill the rest of glass with the Arizona Icetea with lemon. Stir to mix using a spoon. Drink up and enjoy!!!!!!!
2012.name: Arizona Stingers

2120.instructions: pour 2/3 of an oz. of each ingrediant into a shot glass and drink.
2120.name: Three Wise Men (vodka)

2006.instructions: Pour vodka, gin and creme-de-menthe over lots of ice.
2006.name: Earthquake #2

1749.instructions: Mix liquor and chocolate milk in a higball glass, then top with whipped cream and cinnamon.
1749.name: Dickhead's Delight

1787.instructions: Add ice and shots in a hurricane or other tall glass. Add 1/2 of the sprite. Shake Well Add rest of sprite. Finished ingredient should look similar to pink lemonade. Enjoy!
1787.name: Strawberry Surprise

1824.instructions: pour 6 oz. of coffee in a mug or Irish coffee cup. add coca mix and chambord, mix well and top off with whipped cream.
1824.name: Mocha-Berry

1736.instructions: Use a spoon when You pour the Tequila into the glass, so it doesn't mix with the Tabasco
1736.name: Desert Water

1878.instructions: Poure the rum and the lemon-juice in the bowl, and mix it. Then you take the cocoa-powder and the hot coffee and mix it with the other stuff in the bowl. After that you poure your mixture in a shot-glass. The whipped cream you put on the top of the glass. Ready to be served!
1878.name: Rum a'la Olof

1750.instructions: Layer ingredients in the glass, in the following order: Baileys first, Malibu next, Drambuie last Serve with a smile (to placate the Leprechauns), wearing no underwear (och!), and thinking of sex (mon). Glug. Whee!
1750.name: Kilted Black Leprechaun

1993.instructions: Pour 2 cl Galliano into a shot glass, float 2cl hot filter coffee over it and top with lightly thickened cream as to create three layers.
1993.name: Galliano Hotshot #2

2054.instructions: Layer ingrediants in order listed above. Then squeeze lemon over layered ingrediants. Be sure to mount lemon wedge on side of glass or place in glass.
2054.name: Harry Alligator

1743.instructions: Pour the ingredients in a glass, stir.
1743.name: Bloody O.J.

1972.instructions: Mix as normal, pour in shot glass, and set on fire. Put it out any way you want.
1972.name: Pyro

2147.instructions: Chill Tia Maria and Baileys Irish cream 20 degrees In shot glass fill half way with Tia Maria then very carefully add Bailey Irish cream on top. Do not allow them to mix. Keep them seperated. There's your shot. Enjoy!
2147.name: Tiatip

2217.instructions: Mix all ingredients into a large punch bowl or ice chest. Slice fruit and add into mixture. More Cranberry juice may be added if you are a bunch of light-weights. Stir vigorously with a paddle.
2217.name: K-V-S Kaboom

1919.instructions: Add the coffe first , then add alchohol and finally you should add the sugar. Shake well :c)
1919.name: Sjarsk

1855.instructions: Just Mix it together, with the most alcoholic drinks in the end.... Good luck!!!!
1855.name: Bongs Anfield Slammer

2132.instructions: Poor shots into jar or glass and then poor can of dew in!! Mix well and enjoy!!!
2132.name: Voodoo Dew

1936.instructions: mix all ingredients in glass and enjoy!!
1936.name: Satin Angel

1813.instructions: Shake Well - Do not stir. Best if served with crushed ice.
1813.name: Italian Ice

1992.instructions: Pour the beer into the pint glass. Add the lime juice and the Hooch. Stir with a spoon or something like that. Enjoy!
1992.name: Lime Time

1793.instructions: Add liquer first. Use a glass beverage container to highlight the the green color.
1793.name: Slimer

1998.instructions: Crush the cherries in the glass and mix it with the other ingrediences
1998.name: Pulp Vega

2127.instructions: mix all on the rocks,shake,strain,and serve.
2127.name: Plead the 5th

1943.instructions: Fill half the shot glass with the kool-aid first. Then put a paper towel over the top of the glass and slowly pour in the vodka. If you do it right, you should be able to see that the two liquids are separated, with the vodka on top. Now slam it! The last thing you'll taste is the kool-aid.
1943.name: Kool-Aid Slammer

1987.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a glass (larger than 12 oz.). Put a lid over the glass. Shake vigorously for 30 seconds.
1987.name: Hunka Hunka Burnin Luv

1733.instructions: Put some icecubes into a highball glass. Pour Absolut Kurant in the glass and fill up with Russian. Add a straw. Drink.
1733.name: Kurant

2051.instructions: Place whole eggs, in shell, (organic would be preferable) in a jar. Cover with lemon/lime juice. Seal the jar and refrigerate. Leave the eggs to marinate for 2-3 weeks. The shells should become soft. Place the eggs and juice in a blender and blend until smooth. Strain to remove egg membranes. Add sugar and pisco to taste.
2051.name: Leche de Monja

2156.instructions: To a glass of ice add Captain Morgan's spiced rum. Add a splash of tonic water. Rim glass with lime. Drink. Repeat.
2156.name: Boat drink

2200.instructions: sit outside on balcony, fill glass with crushed ice, sqeeze lime, hold glass up to the sky (best effect during sunset), pour rum up to horizon , add some coke to cover the sky (no overflow), stir smoothly, lean back & ENJOY! Maximum effect with bass heavy dub reggae in the background
2200.name: The Real Cuba Libre

2202.instructions: Combine Rum and Cranberry juice first. Add splash of Sunny D. May drink with crushed ice, if prefered.
2202.name: Cran-Ram

2184.instructions: Mix the Aftershock with vodka, in no particular order.
2184.name: Photon Torpedo

2079.instructions: Fill the highball glass (or preferrably a 32oz glass) half way with crushed ice. Then add the shots of alcohol in this order: bacardi 151 rum, crown royal, and vanilla liqeur. Now pour one can of pepsi into the mixture. Finally, stir well with a barspoon, or any long spoon to evenly distribute the ingredients.
2079.name: Vanilla Vargas

1846.instructions: Pour all ingrediants into a shaker 2/3 full of ice. Stir well - strain into a highball glass.
1846.name: Black Watch

1906.instructions: Fill Absolut into a glass. Add Lime juice. Add Ice and lime wedges.
1906.name: Absolut limousine

2174.instructions: Fill glass with ice then pour ingrediants in order then stir.
2174.name: Sweet Death

1850.instructions: First, add cubed ice, then add the three parts stoli, then add the pineapple juice and last but not least, add the cranberry juice for color.
1850.name: Bay Breeze

1891.instructions: Fill shot glass with rum. Dip lemon wedge in sugar.
1891.name: Lemon Drop #3

1814.instructions: Put the juice of 1/2 Lime in glass, then pour in cola and barcardi dark. Top up with Everclear. Light. Figure out how to drink it!
1814.name: Barcardi Volcano

2112.instructions: Make hot chocolate (preferably using water) according to instructions. Mix in Rumple Minze and enjoy.
2112.name: Hot Peppermint Chocolate

2087.instructions: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker and shake well, pour into a tall cocktail glass and add a slice of lemon.
2087.name: Bakkus

1838.instructions: Combine all and stir. Serve in highball glass over ice

1816.instructions: Stud the strips of orange and lemon peel with 2 cloves each and place them in a frying pan or chafing dish with the stick of cinnamon and the 2 teaspoons of sugar. Place over moderate heat, stirring occationally with a wooden spoon, until the sugar has melted. Pour the Irish Whiskey into the pan and light a match to the liquid. (Be sure to step back since the flame will flare up instantly.) Shake the pan to and fro slowly until the flame dies out. Pour in the hot coffee all at once and let it come to a simmer. Remove from the heat. Rub the cut edge of a strip of lemon peel around the inside of each the irish coffee cup and dip it into a dish of caster sugar so that the sugar adheres to the inside rim. Pour in the coffee, trying not to disturb the sugar. Top each serving with a dollop of whipped cream.
1816.name: Irish Coffee #3

Pour mixed Jell-O and Vodka into glasses or small cups for serving. Let set in freezer (vodka requires colder temperature to set). Serve after it has set with a spoon.

(The oj also does a nice job of killing the vodka taste) . Then enjoy.
