2285.name: Purple Pancho

2603.instructions: Fill a large glass with ice. Add vodka and fill glass with Pepsi (Do NOT substitute Coke). Swirl a splash of Galliano on top.
2603.name: Root Beer

2539.instructions: Made as in a normal Vodka and Orange, with raspberry cordial added last.
2539.name: Whippet

2443.instructions: Pour vodka and bitters into mixing glass with several ice cubes. Stir until very cold and pour into a chilled old-fashioned glass. Score peel of orange wedge with tines of fork and drop into drink.
2443.name: St. Petersburg

2311.instructions: Take a tall glass and put in a few ice cubes, fill the vodka over it and fill with juice then the "creme", to end fill in the grenadine but very carefully at the side of the glass so it will lay down in the bottom. garnish with orange and strawberry.
2311.name: San Francisco

2513.instructions: Fill glass 1/4 with coffee, pour Tia Maria, Frangelico, & Amaretto slowly, add whipped cream on top, cherry if you want to. When drinking, stir gently if you like your coffee light. Drink from the bottom with a straw if you like it strong. Still looking for a better name, e-mail me if you think of one, or if you've heard of it with another name. imrey@aol.com
2513.name: Lee's Drink

2535.instructions: Take a shot glass and take equal amounts of the liquor. First the Kahlua, then slowly pour down the Drambuie, then the Bailey's and last the Cointreau. Try to get fine layers.
2535.name: Napalm-Death

2636.instructions: keep both liquors cold and serve ina chilled shot glass if possible
2636.name: Rambo Shot

2325.instructions: Mix kalhua, amaretto, and ice-cream. Swirl chocolate in the glass and add whip cream on top.
2325.name: Mexican Mudslide

2405.instructions: Just blend with ice in a highball glass.
2405.name: Polar Bear #2

2399.instructions: shake well and pour in a cocktail glass frosted with strawberry.
2399.name: Net surfer

2566.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into an old fashioned glass.
2566.name: Bull Shot #3

2369.instructions: Fill 14oz glass with ice and alcohol. Fill 2/3 glass with cola and remainder with sweet & sour. Top with dash of bitters and lemon wedge.
2369.name: 3-Mile Long Island Iced Tea

2589.instructions: Pour alcohol over ice in a cocktail glass and add milk! (For a bit of a twist you could add a splash of Bailey's Irish Cream. This drink is also tasty as a 'special' coffee. Just sugar your rim, add liqour, pour coffee and add some whip.)
2589.name: Monkey's Lunch

2615.instructions: Pour vodka, then orange juice, then peach schnapps. Drink.
2615.name: Fuzzy Peachclari

2350.instructions: Stir the ingredients together and strain into a sugar-rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with mintleaves.
2350.name: Glacier Mint

2417.instructions: Pour in a shaker and shake well, then serve in a cocktail glass frosted with tangerine.
2417.name: The Race

2275.instructions: Shake briskley for 10 seconds and serve in a tall glass over ice.
2275.name: By The Pool

2505.instructions: Pour the vodka and rum carefully but not too carefully into a glass. They have different consistencies and you want them to mix just a little. Now let several drops of Bailey's fall into the liquor.
2505.name: C*m in a Hot Tub

2229.instructions: Add ice and all the ingredients into a shaker and shake well. Then serve in a large glass.
2229.name: Creamy Tan

2329.instructions: Mix Absolut Vodka and Blue Curaco, fill it up with Sprite. Use lots of icecubes.
2329.name: Polar Bear, Swedish

2349.instructions: Fill a shot glass with Apfelkorn almost to the rim. Then, very carefully pour a little Bailey's into the glass. The two liquors don't mix at if poured correctly, and the Bailey's will sink to the bottom as a nasty looking blob, not unlike a brain.
2349.name: Monkey Brain #1

2543.instructions: Mix the icing sugar with the red wine, and stir well. Pour in the soda. Put in some Orange/Lemon slices. Serve immediately with a lot of ice.
2543.name: Red Wine Punch

2444.instructions: Mix ingredients with cracked ice in a shaker or blender. Pour into a chilled old-fashioned glass.
2444.name: Black Magic

2223.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass. Add a splash of 7-up.
2223.name: Shot-o-Happiness

2551.instructions: Mix in shotglass(es). Add Curacao last, to a nice blue-green color.
2551.name: TGV

2390.instructions: Very carefully layer the vodka on top of the green Chartreuse. Drop in the Tabasco, which should sink to the bottom. Slam it.
2390.name: Snakebite #2

2483.instructions: Add Grenadine (based on desired sweetness), followed by Absolut. Add ice and then Sprite (her preferred mixing).
2483.name: The Betty Ford

2634.instructions: Mix the contents so that the color of the drink is a pink color. Serve and enjoy
2634.name: Strawberry Quick

2296.instructions: Shake with ice in a tumbler. Strain and pour.
2296.name: Sloe Comfortable Screw #2

2263.instructions: Open the Corona. Fill the empty space in the neck in the bottle with the rum. The bottle should be filled to the top. Plug the bottle with your thumb or the palm of your hand. Turn the bottle upside-down so the rum and beer mix. Turn the bottle rightside-up, unplug, and drink.
2263.name: Limona Corona

2537.instructions: add the liquors and grenadine. Mix. Strain. Add splash of Sprite. Add lemon squeeze. Drinker adds shot of beer.
2537.name: Baltimore Zoo

2611.instructions: Shake all the ingredients. Serve in a chilled cocktail glass. Add a twist of orange.
2611.name: Peach me Tender

2326.instructions: Mix in pitcher with ice, Pour into glass with ice, And enjoy.
2326.name: Down Home Punch #1

2238.instructions: stir or shake ingredients & serve with ice
2238.name: Sloe Comfortable Screw #1

2516.instructions: Stir ingredients on ice and strain into martini glass.
2516.name: Cosmopolitan #3

2242.instructions: Fill glass with large ice cubes. Mix alcoholic ingredients in the glass. Fill the rest of the glass with Dole pineapple-orange juice and stir.
2242.name: Georgia Tea

2716.instructions: Combine all contents in blender except cherries, blend until smooth. Pour in mug, garnish with cherries.
2716.name: Jedi Mind Trick

2343.instructions: Shake ingredients in a mixing cup with ice. Strain into 7 oz. rocks glass and serve.
2343.name: Scooby Snack #1

2546.instructions: Pour ingredients on the rocks and enjoy.
2546.name: Peach Death

2637.instructions: Add Vodka, Melon Liqueur and Cranberry Juice in a shaker, Fill glass with three ice cubes,strain mix into highball/zombie glass,add dash of Amaretto (Optional)
2637.name: Killer Koolade

2305.instructions: Combine all into a tall glass and serve with ice. As an option, use two cans of Mountain Dew if the drink seems too strong for you.
2305.name: Lethal Weapon

2310.instructions: Pour the vodka and creme over some ice cubes in a tall glass and fill up with juice. to make it beuty full make the top of the glass with a grenadine and sugar
2310.name: After sex

2717.instructions: Pour the Galliano liqueur over ice. Fill the remainder of the glass with ginger ale and thats all there is to it. You now have a your very own GG.
2717.name: GG

2382.instructions: Fill glass with cracked ice and add gin, cream, lemon juice, egg white, sugar and orange juice. Shake and strain into a chilled Collins glass, then add Club soda.
2382.name: Ramos Fizz #2

2662.instructions: Mix equal parts over ice then shake, strain, and serve.
2662.name: Naked Yellow Bird

2558.instructions: Moisten rim of cocktail glass with lime juice and dip in salt. Shake ingredients together, and pour into glass filled with crushed ice. Option: Mix above ingredients with one cup of ice in blender for a smooth, "granita" type drink.
2558.name: Midori Margarita

2486.instructions: Shake not too short with enough ice.
2486.name: Casablanca #2

2243.instructions: Pour vodka into glass over ice followed by Creme de Banana, then top it up with Sprite & stir.
2243.name: Yellow Birdie

2597.instructions: Put each of the ingredients into a punch bowl. Mix, and with a straw, SHOOT.
2597.name: Donivan Flowers' Rocks

2531.instructions: Combine with ice. Shake. Strain and add ice.
2531.name: Maria Theresa

2363.instructions: Add both ingredients to shot glass, shoot, and get drunk quick

2564.instructions: No specific mixinginstructions, just poor every ingredient in one glass. The lemon goes with it.
2564.name: Zoksel

2250.instructions: Red wine first, then the cider.
2250.name: Seaside-Summerbliss

2290.instructions: Put salt between thumb and index finger on back of left hand. Hold shot glass of tequila in salted hand and lemon wedge in the other. Lick salt, slam the tequila, then suck lemon.
2290.name: Tequila (Straight)

2279.instructions: Shake with ice cubes and pour into old-fashioned glass rimmed with salt.
2279.name: Hot Pants

2332.instructions: Fill glass with ice and add shots of Bacardi and Malibu. Add splash of pineapple juice and top with orange juice. Add grenadine for color and garnish with cherries.
2332.name: Space Odyssey

2297.instructions: Put incrediments in cold glass. Stir well.
2297.name: Think Pink

2489.instructions: Pour over ice, shake vigorously, Strain into martini style cocktail glass. Garnish with one filbert.
2489.name: Russian Qualude #2

2358.instructions: mix all the ingredients, and shake well.
2358.name: Nuts and Berries #3

2635.instructions: Fill a shaker with ice. Pour in equal parts liquor. Shake or swirl. Strain into shot glass(es). Serve with a short, cold glass of beer.
2635.name: Ball Hooter

2499.instructions: Mix melon liqueur, sour, and soda with ice in shaker. Shake and strain into martini glass. Top with rum and ignite.
2499.name: Mad Scientist #2

2404.instructions: Just mix in a highball glass.
2404.name: Olle Goop

2442.instructions: Mix all ingredients with cracked ice in a shaker or blender and pour into a chilled cocktail glass.
2442.name: Cossack Charge

2638.instructions: Get a sports container like the All Sport or Gatorade ones at sports events and combine three ingredients together. Put in about 4-5 pounds of cocktail ice and watch it disappear faster than water!
2638.name: Simpson Solution

2446.instructions: Pour peach schnapps into ice filled collins glass. Fill with orange juice and stir to combine.
2446.name: Fuzzy Navel (original)

2406.instructions: Fill with V-8 and shake vigorously. Add black pepper to taste and garnish with celery and lemon wedge. Serve in Collins glass filled with ice.
2406.name: Hell Mary

2393.instructions: Pour gin and campari over a couple of icecubes. Fill up with russian!
2393.name: Hashi Bashi

2476.instructions: Mix Coffee, Jack Daniels and Amaretto. Add Cream on top.
2476.name: Tennesee Mud

2312.instructions: 1. Fill mixing glass with ice 2. Add light rum and lime juice and sugar syrup 3. Shake 4. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice 5. Fill with club soda. 6. Garnish with a wedge of lime.
2312.name: Rum Rickey

2671.instructions: Mix all ingredients into a large cooler, punch bowl or garbage can (a new one). Cut larger fruit into pieces and add.
2671.name: Hairy Buffalo

2475.instructions: Fill a pint glass a quarter of the way with ice, then add the rums and juice. Fill the rest of the glass with the Sweet and Sour, almost to the top, then finish it off with the grenadine. Mix and serve.
2475.name: Red Ox

2503.instructions: Mix it all togheter and stir it up.
2503.name: Harley Davidson #2

2648.instructions: Combine in an ice cube-filled Collins glass. Garnish with a lime wedge
2648.name: Copperhead

2246.instructions: Pour the Captain Morgan over plenty of ice in a highball glass. Top with the seven-up, stir and enjoy!
2246.name: Captain's Cream Soda

2251.instructions: Put two scoops of vanilla ice-cream in your cup. Pour in a shot of Goldschlager then fill the glass with root beer. Mix with a spoon and enjoy!
2251.name: Shlagerfloat

2621.instructions: Combine, chill and strain into either a shot glass or ups glass.
2621.name: Wild Peppertini

2345.instructions: Mixing glass 1/4 filled with ice. Mix all four ingredients then strain into rocks glass.
2345.name: Watermelon shooter #1

2432.instructions: Serve in an old fashioned glass.
2432.name: Grand Blue

2502.instructions: Fill blender up with ice. Fill half with Bartons Vodka. Put 10 tsp of sugar, add 1/2 can lemonade concentrate, fill to top with water. Blend for 60 seconds.
2502.name: Adam Sunrise

2693.instructions: Fill a mug half way with Bacardi, then top off with lemon Kool-Aid or lemonade.
2693.name: Lemon Drop #6

2517.instructions: Mix well. Garnish with Orange and Cherry. Enjoy
2517.name: Absolut Stress #2

2496.instructions: Build into a Pint Glass and cheery garnish. It's a real lady killer in San Diego.
2496.name: Naked Twister

2235.instructions: Pour Campari in the glass. Add Indian Tonic Water. Stir with a spoon. Add ice if you want & a slice of Orange.
2235.name: Malaria Killer

2467.instructions: Add Bailey's to shot glass and and add Buterscotch on top.
2467.name: Copper Camel

2549.instructions: Fill blender with coffee ice-cream and the amount of kahula to your desire. Blend until drinkable, pour into a beer mug and garnish with a cinnamon stick.
2549.name: Caffine attack

2583.instructions: Add all ingrediants in mixing tin with ice and strain
2583.name: Simpson Bronco

2660.instructions: Fill 1/3th of the glass with Tia Maria. Then pour smootly on a spoon the baileys so it flows on the Tai Maria. Then fill the glass up with Grand Marnier also with a spoon. Afterwards you see 3 layers, the middle layer looks like a after boming scene.
2660.name: B-52 #5

2292.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Top with a little whipped cream and sprinkle lightly with cocoa.
2292.name: Toreador

2643.instructions: Pour all ingrediants into a large punch bowl. Add ice and 4 oranges that are peeled and divided.
2643.name: Apricot punch

2504.instructions: Add Schnapps, Dribble Bailey's to give the look of a brain and add a few drops of grenadine to make that hemmorage look.
2504.name: Brain Tumor #2

2228.instructions: Pour the Frangelico first over a glass with ice. Then, pour the Bailey's over the top, but do not stir the drink.
2228.name: Nutty Irishman (without milk)

2308.instructions: Mix all ingredients and Shake well. Sweet at first, with a BITE at the end...
2308.name: Texas Rattlesnake

2569.instructions: Splash a puddle of Angostura bitters into a saucer and place the sugar cube in it to soak. This will take a minute ot two. Stir the Champagne (or sparkling wine), the Vodka and the Blue Curacao together in a container and put into the fridge to chill. Place the soaked sugar cube in the bottom of the Champagne glass, pour in the mixture and add drop in the cocktail onion, which should be loose, not on a cocktail stick.
2569.name: Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster #2

2500.instructions: Add 1 shot rum to 12 oz beer, stir in 2 tbls lime juice concentrate.
2500.name: Juniata Juice

2681.instructions: Blend all but the whipped cream until frosty. Pour in beer mug. Top with whipped cream. Enjoy.
2681.name: Strawberry Shortcake

2257.instructions: This can be on the rocks or up... but best on the rocks! Start with the Midori since it is heaviest, then the Chambord and the Absolut. Fill the glass 2/3 full with Cranberry juice, and then a splash of grapefruit for color. It should be an orangish-red color. Garnish with several cherries.
2257.name: Sex on the Beach #4

2592.instructions: Put all ingredients except the 3 lime wedges into a shaker. Squeeze 2 of the lime wedges into the shaker. SHAKE WELL! Rim outside of glass only, with lime. Salt only the outside of glass. Add fresh crushed ice to glass. Strain mixture over ice. Squeeze remaining lime wedge in glass. Enjoy!
2592.name: The Perfect Margarita #1

2479.instructions: Pour the coffee in an ordinary coffee cup. Add the aquavit. Add sugar by taste. Stir and have a nice evening (morning)
2479.name: Swedish Coffee

2485.instructions: Mix add shake all the ingredience except the soda water in a shaker with ice. Pour it into a collins glas, add up with sodawater. Add ice and a lemon slide.
2485.name: Lemonsquash a la vermouth

2379.instructions: Served on ice in "rocks-glass" May be served with a little whipped creem on top!
2379.name: French Afternoon

2224.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.
2224.name: Turkeyball

2584.instructions: use large metal container with plenty of ice and a strainer. Shake well, pour through strainer into margarita glass. Serve with salt and fresh lime.
2584.name: Hand-Shaken Margarita on the Rocks

2614.instructions: In a hurricane glass or any tall glass: Fill glass 1/3 full of Fz. strawberry daiquiri. Layer next 1/3 of glass with Fz. Pina Colada. Add a splash of Blue Curacao on top. Insert straw and fill with 151 Rum.
2614.name: No Pressure

2606.instructions: Place 2-3 ice cubes in your choice of glass, pour 2oz vodka followed by 6oz Sunny Delight (more or less to taste). Stir and serve.
2606.name: Phillips Screwdriver

2380.instructions: Fill a rocks glass with ice, then add Scotch and kahlua. Float cream on top and stir.
2380.name: Aggravation

2644.instructions: Mix all ingrediants over ice. Seven-Up may be used instead of champagne to cut alcohol content if so desired.
2644.name: Apricot Smoothie

2656.instructions: Shake over ice in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice.
2656.name: Zombie #2

2701.instructions: Fill cocktail chimney glass with crushed ice, fill 3/4 full with club soda, add a shot of blueberry schnapps and a splash of o.j. Can garnish with an orange peel or a blueberry.
2701.name: Bluesberry Cooler

2702.instructions: Mix vodka and tequila. Pour in Tabasco sauce until it's realy red.
2702.name: Hot Spot

2278.instructions: Mix all ingredients in blender except grenadine. Pour into collins glass and float grenadine on top. Garnish with a lime slice.
2278.name: Hairy Sunrise

2692.instructions: Add ice. Shake it. Strain it. Shoot it.
2692.name: Grand-Ma in a Wheelchair

2477.instructions: Just pour it all into the blender and mix until desired consistency is achieved.
2477.name: Midori Chan

2508.instructions: Mix fruit juices together in one bowl, place in blender with ice cubes. When slushy mixture is complete, stir in alcohol and shake until completly mixed. Place mixture in punchbowl, and float cherries in the bowl if desired.
2508.name: Dancing Dutchman

2510.instructions: high ball glas fill it with ice. poor vodka over the ice, then fill up with sprite. poor slowly 1cl blue curacao, after that poor 1cl grenadine. Ready to serv. The guest will now stir it and the drink will turn purple.
2510.name: William's Rainbow

2221.instructions: Pour Cointreau into glass. Using a spoon, drop the Cherry Advocaat in so it sits on the bottom of the glass. Making sure you have a straw handy, throw the shot back, place the glass on the nearest table and quickly cover the opening of the glass with your hand. Stick the straw between the fingers covering the glass and suck!
2221.name: Blood Clot #2

2678.instructions: Crush sugar into the lime wedges with a spoon. Place the lime wedges in the bottom of an 8 oz. glass. Cover with crushed ice. Pour vodka to fill the glass. It's a great summer drink.
2678.name: Caipiroska

2357.instructions: mix together into a double shotglass
2357.name: Snowball #3

2472.instructions: Pour Whiskey and Peach Schnapps over ice cubes in a High Ball Glass. Add frozen canned orange banana punch (no water). Add lemon juice and fill the rest with pepsi. Stir well and serve.
2472.name: God's Great Creation

2700.instructions: Add the coffee liqueur first since it is heavier than the schnapps. Slowly add the peppermint schnapps.
2700.name: Horny Girlscout

2645.instructions: First add the Bailey's irish cream, then the Tia Maria, and then carefully the Absinthe: Put the shot on fire and drink it with a straw, or you have another choice: When the shot is on fire you slap it to extinguish the fire and then you drink it.
2645.name: B-52 #4

2562.instructions: mix just like you would a screwdriver, except substitute lime vodka
2562.name: Jolly Green Giant

2236.instructions: Mix together in shot glass and "discharge" into mouth!
2236.name: Canadian Hunter

2666.instructions: Using a large glass of water, add lemonade concentrate to taste (Best if you make it a little stronger than usual). Add the 1.5 shots of Everclear and be sure to mix well!
2666.name: Devil's Piss

2222.instructions: Add crushed ice to snifter or gobblet. Add Triple Sec, Brandy, Cherry Heering, Grenadine and Sour Mix. Stir contents. Add sliced fruit. Top off glass with Champagne.
2222.name: Original Sin

2445.instructions: Mix all ingredients with cracked ice in a shaker or blender and pour into highball glass.
2445.name: Siberian Sunrise

2624.instructions: First slice half a lemon in small slices. Then some ice, I prefer alot of ice in this drink. Pour the vodka in, press the rest of the lemon in the glass. Mix around and then fill up with Schweppes lemon. Mix again and you're finished. If you don't got the Schweppes lemon you can always use Fanta lemon instead, but it will be a lot sweeter.
2624.name: Moilanen

2262.instructions: Pour Crown Royal into beer mug (or whatever type of glass that is available). Fill with chilled Dr. Pepper or add ice cubes before pouring. Stir gently with fork, spoon, knife, toothbrush or whatever is handy or forget to stir and wait for surprise at bottom.
2262.name: The Drink of Champions

2587.instructions: Scoop ice-cream into a large bowl (stainless or glass, but plastic will do). Slowly pour wine into bowl and mix until smooth (but not runny, or melted). Fold in (well drained) fruit cocktail. Serve in wine glass with ice-cream scoop (add tacky paper umbrella if desired). Keep in freezer when not being served.
2587.name: Blonde Smoothie

2410.instructions: Mix drinks over ice before serving in a shot glass. Tastes like a peppermint patty!
2410.name: Polar Bear #3

2463.instructions: Pour gently, i'ts important to get 2 layers. Use a shot glass. You can use 2 cl of each, if 3 is to much for you.
2463.name: Black Army

2689.instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a large highball glass over ice cubes. Sprinkle with nutmeg.
2689.name: Waldorf-Astoria Eggnog

2468.instructions: Put ice in glass. Pour in ingredients. Gently swirl to mix. Drink.
2468.name: Dr. Daniel

2626.instructions: Follow the instructions on the can of Lemonade concentrate, but substitute the Vodka for water. Mix well and add beer.
2626.name: Lemonade Bomb

2253.instructions: Layer all 4 ingredients in shot glass. In this order Jagermeister, Goldschlager, Jameson's and Jack Daniels.
2253.name: Blood of Satan

2448.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing tin and shake with ice. Pour into a collins glass. No garnish.
2448.name: Absolut Stress #1

2580.instructions: Pour alcohol into the shot glass. Occassionally mix with ice then put into a shot glass. Serve with a lemon wedge.
2580.name: Harley Davidson (the company way)

2709.instructions: Shake with cracked ice. Serve in a 12 oz. glass. Garnish with a cherry and 1/2 slice orange in a tooth pick.
2709.name: Bahama Mama #2

2411.instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in shaker. Shake and strain into shot glass.
2411.name: Poison Apple

2935.instructions: Pour Jagermeister in shaker over ice. Fill with coke and shake til your arms are sore. Pour into glass and top with a smidgen of Bacrdi 151. If your feeling mean, feel free to light it!
2935.name: Jake-Knife

2994.instructions: Garnish with a slice of pear.
2994.name: Pear Martini

2995.instructions: Chill all ingredients. Just before serving combine in a punch bowl. Unmold ice ring and float in bowl. Serve in tall glasses. Makes 10 large servings.
2995.name: Black-Eyed Susan

3000.instructions: Shake and strain into collins glass with ice. Garnish with a cherry.
3000.name: Bloated Bag of Monkey Spunk

2812.instructions: Just get a high-ball glass and add your 1 or 2 shot(s) of Bailey's, then your 1 or 2 shots of Tia Maria, then just simply slowly top the glass with the coca-cola. It will fizz alot so watch out! Due to the fizz a straw is a definate recommindation.
2812.name: Mudslide #3

3006.instructions: Mix the Snapple and whiskey in a pewter martini shaker. (preferably pewter because it keeps the drink so cold). Next step put crushed ice in very last so you do not water down the drink. Serve in a martini glass or a huricane glass with 4 lemon drops.
3006.name: Snapple sensation

2807.instructions: Wet glass, dip rim in sugar. Then add Ice. Then add everything else. It's that simple!
2807.name: Jitterbug

3022.instructions: mix all ingredients into bowl keep iced stir frequently
3022.name: Pink Penocha

2990.instructions: Stir together Milk and Schnapps, pour into highball glass, and serve
2990.name: Cold Fire

2802.instructions: This a kind of a Pousse Cafe. Float Irish cream over the Kahlua. Shake Cream with Cointreau. Float on the Irish cream. Garnish with choclate.
2802.name: Lady 52

2814.instructions: Pour around 2-3 oz. of Whiskey into a glass, then fill the rest up with Vernors.
2814.name: Monkey Spanker

2989.instructions: Put ice cubes in glass. Add bourbon, coke and lime juice. Garnish with slice of lime (optional)
2989.name: The Peg

2763.instructions: Skaking Serves with ice an a Lemon
2763.name: Rum Aid

2811.instructions: Fill cocktail glass to the top with clean ice. Straight pour about 4 oz of Makers Mark over ice. Add Coca-Cola to taste.
2811.name: Mark and Coke

2829.instructions: Fill Collins Glass with ice Pour in Blue Curacao first Next pour in Sloe Gin but be careful, the appearance of the drink is very important. Pour gently onto the ice so as to layer it. Next fill it with cream also layering it. The result should be a blue and red drink with tendrils of white shooting through the colors.
2829.name: Born on the 4th of July

2939.instructions: First add the Amaretto, then the Bailey's, and then carefully the Rum. Put the shot on fire and drink it with a straw, or you have another choice: When the shot is on fire you slap it to extinguish the fire and then you drink it.
2939.name: B-52 #6

2745.instructions: Add Vidka and peach juice. Fill glass with ice and add vanilla to taste. If the drink is too sweet, dilute it with water.
2745.name: Ejhazz

2871.instructions: Chill all ingredients well. Mix equal parts and serve in a cordial glass. Or, if you have a test tube or beaker handy, go for it!
2871.name: Epidural

2842.instructions: Mix 1 part of each type of alcohol (1 shot or less of each) in a large glass. Top off with Fruit Punch. Serve with ice.
2842.name: Roadrunner Punch

2837.instructions: Mix vodka, gin, rum, tequila, triple sec and curacao. Add sour mix. Add Curacao until it's dark purple. Fill glass with ice cubes and fload Bacardi 151 rum on top. Have the flame blown out before drinking add a straw.
2837.name: Flaming Goat

2821.instructions: Put all ingredients in a pitcher. The Cava can be very cold.
2821.name: Agua de Valencia

2981.instructions: Stir. Add whipped cream to the top.
2981.name: Kioki Coffee

2985.instructions: Fill a highball with ice, add the vodka, lemon juice and cran. Garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.
2985.name: Tiger Woods

2817.instructions: First put the tequila, then the vodka, then the black rum, then the Bailey's Irish Cream, then the Granadine syrup and then mix this five elements for that the drink become pink, to finish put the Absinthe with the help of a spoon. Put the shot on fire and drink it with a straw, or you have another choice: When the shot is on fire you slap it to extinguish the fire and then you drink it.
2817.name: Pedra (stone)

2825.instructions: Pour all ingredients with an ice cube into a shaker.
2825.name: Green Zone

2739.instructions: Add all contents to a large jug or punch bowl. Stir well!
2739.name: Mudslinger

2824.instructions: Place gin or vodka, triple sec, vermouth, grenadine and ice in shaker. Shake well and pour into glass. Fill with tonic water or club soda.
2824.name: Johnny Cat

2873.instructions: Half fill a highball glass with crushed ice. Next pour in 1.5oz. of your favorite brand of Light Rum. Now pour in .5oz. of liqiud pina colada mix, and then fill to the top of the glass with pineapple juice. After stirring ingrediences, pour in .5oz. of grenadine and alow to settle on the bottom of the glass (do not stir after adding grenadine),garnish the glass with an orange wedge, and then serve "Mon"!
2873.name: Cayman Sunset

2876.instructions: Shake all ingredients over ice and pour into highball glass. No garnish.
2876.name: Algae

2885.instructions: Add ice to blender (or to glass if prefer on the rocks) then fruit, and fruite juice depending on personal prefference then add the Rum, Vodka, Tequila, and triple sec. blend till smooth, rim glass with sugar or salt and pour mixture in. garnish with lemon or lime slice.
2885.name: Adam Bomb

2852.instructions: Mix with ice and strain into a shot glass
2852.name: Cowboy Cocksucker #2

2838.instructions: Mix gentle, and add ice cubes. Serve whith Straw.
2838.name: Spring

2832.instructions: Shake with lots of ice, strain into glass
2832.name: Snake in the grass

2799.instructions: Pour all the stuff in a punch bowl and drink. (Tastes better with Diet Dew)
2799.name: Morning Dew

2913.instructions: Blend until smooth. Pour into hurricane glass rimmed with grenadine and coconut shavings.
2913.name: Latin Love

2729.instructions: Mix ingredients together over ice in a glass. Pour into shaker and give ONE brisk shake. Pour back into glass and make sure there is a touch of fizz at the top. Garnish with lemon.
2729.name: Long Island Iced Tea (By a Long Islander)

2946.instructions: shake like hell whith some ice
2946.name: Sex on the Beach #10

2975.instructions: Mix ingredients in glass. Drink if you can.
2975.name: Terror From the Deep

2879.instructions: Fill blender cup with 15 ounces of small ice cubes, add rum, passion fruit syrup and sweet and sour and blend until smooth, in a hurricane glass pour the blended strawberries, then add the blended mixture, the strawberries will ooze up the sides of the glass and it will look like a beautiful sunset. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.
2879.name: Sweet Sunset

2881.instructions: Stir sugar and vodka together. Add milk. Serve cold with a straw.
2881.name: The Power of Milk

2882.instructions: Full collins glass with ice, pour in Limon, add sweet and sour, fill with equal parts club soda and 7-up
2882.name: Pedro Collins

2773.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour in 1 oz. of gin followed by 1 oz. of Blue Curaco. Fill glass with orange juice, garnish with orange and cherry and serve.
2773.name: Aqua Fodie

3011.instructions: Pour beer into mug. Add lemonade. Float SoCo on top.
3011.name: Skip And Go Naked #2

2771.instructions: Combine all ingredients in glass mixer, chill and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist.
2771.name: Neopolitan

2957.instructions: Pour Grenadine on the edge of the glass and then sugar to create a red edge on the glass. Then pour all three ingredienses in a shaker and shake it well with crushed ice. Finally pour it in the glass.
2957.name: Green Milkshake

2947.instructions: Add some ICE Put in the shaker Shake your ass off
2947.name: Rikkertje

2858.instructions: Pour Vodka, Galliano, Cointreau, Grenadine and Milk into a cocktail shaker, shake and pour into a cocktail glass and finish off with a dollop of whipped cream on top.
2858.name: The Pink Drink

2740.instructions: Mix all ingredients, shake and pore over ice in a collins glass. Garnish with a lemon, lime, and orange wedge.
2740.name: The Finnely

2806.instructions: Add ice cubes to shaker. Add vodka. Add peach schnapps. Add peach nectar. Shake. Strain into glass. Add lemon twist.(peel)
2806.name: Bellini Martini

2767.instructions: Mix the fluids into the glass, add a couple ice cubes and (one or) two cherries. Use a thick, red and white striped straw.
2767.name: Polkagris

2786.instructions: Pour over ice, shake until cooled, then pour into glass.
2786.name: Texas Cool-Aid

3007.instructions: Dip the rim of cocktail glass in Amaretto and then into powdered sugar. Shake all alcohol and cream with ice and strain into rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with Cinnamon stick and whipped cream (optional)
3007.name: Wicked Tasty Treat

3024.instructions: Pour over ice in a shaker. Shake well. Served over ice - very chilled!
3024.name: Kosmo

2758.instructions: Shake alcohol with ice. Strain and pour over ice in a tall glass. Add cranberry juice to fill most of the way. Add a splash of 7-up if you want it fizzy!
2758.name: Purple Devil

2820.instructions: Put all ingredients into a blender, then liquify until it becomes a shake. Pour into the beer mugs, and you're set.
2820.name: Liquid Courage

3015.instructions: Pour one part Jack Daneils and one part Jim Beam into shot glass then float Wild Turkey on top.
3015.name: Shot-gun

2734.instructions: Pour beer into large mug, slowly add the 7-up (or Sprite).
2734.name: Radler

2751.instructions: Put a few ice-cubes in a longdrink glass, and put a little lemon juice in it. Then cut a cucumber in two half and cut off a part. Get the seeds out and put it in the glass as well. Shake in a well cooled down bottle of champagne in and let the glass stand in the refrigerator for a while. Then it's ready to drink.
2751.name: Cool Cucumber

2778.instructions: Place one part dry gin in Cocktail Glass. Do NOT bruise the Gin! Carefully add two parts Sprite. Do NOT bruise the Sprite. Optionally, add a dash of cayenne pepper for added flavor. Add 3 tablespoons of dry ice for that mystical, yet strangely, psycho effect.
2778.name: Christmas Tree Water

2938.instructions: Mix the Vodka with the other ingredients after taste.
2938.name: Winegum

2979.instructions: Mix in the order mentioned. You can use what ever kind of cognac, and vodka you prefer.
2979.name: Volvo

2863.instructions: Chill both ingredients!! Mix in a tumbler and enjoy!
2863.name: Apple Grande

2919.instructions: CAREFULLY to avoid explosive head formation: Pour Beer glass half full of favorite rootbeer and top off with Guinness.
2919.name: Black and Brown

2845.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain or with ice.
2845.name: Blitz

2914.instructions: Use a shaker: first put in the ice, then add the orange juice ( you should always add the fruit juices before the alcohol! ). Put both the Passoa and the Malibu in and give it a good shake. Poor in a glass and add a cube of ice. The poor a bit of cream on top of the ice cubes ( preferably using a teaspoon or so to keep the cream from mixing with the other stuff ). Put a cherry on top and voila, there's your Sex on the Beach.
2914.name: Sex on the Beach #9

2976.instructions: You can either drink this one the rocks or frozen. Salt to taste.
2976.name: Purple Margarita

2869.instructions: Line three 1 1/2 oz shot glasses up on the bar. pour each of the liquors into its own glass. Splash the orange juice into the vodka for color. Then shoot (RED YELLOW GREEN)
2869.name: Suicide Stop Light

2918.instructions: Pour all 3 into a shot glass and away you go.
2918.name: Kamikaze #2

2798.instructions: Keep all 3 liquors in freezer till they are viscous. (Jagermeister should have a syrup quality.) Mix all three in shaker and pour in a extra tall frosted shot glass. (Should be one of those unusually tall shot glasses if possible, otherwise use small whiskey glass as this is a unusually large shot.) Serve Cold!
2798.name: Liquid Cocaine #3

2860.instructions: In 5 gal. jug mix thoroughly all of vodka with all of lemons, lemonade, and water, which should be previously combined. Make sure water is ice cold, if not ice or refridgeration may be required.
2860.name: Tripwire

2960.instructions: Pour the Sambuca and Kahlua into the Cocktail Glass and give the drinker a straw. Pour the Baileys and Blue Curacao into two sepsrate shot glasses either side of the cocktail glass. Set light the concotion in the cocktail glass and start to drink through the straw (this drink should be drunk in one) , as the bottom of the glass is reached put out the fire by pouring the Baileys and Blue Curacao into the cocktail glass and keep drinking till it's all gone!!
2960.name: Flaming Lamborghini

2974.instructions: Put all the indgrediens into a glass and serve it cold.
2974.name: Danger

3004.instructions: Pour all three ingredients into the shot glass and shake until mixed together
3004.name: Sit On My Face Mary Jane

3026.instructions: Pour ingredients over ice and stir.
3026.name: Orange Whip

3030.instructions: Combine all ingredients in Collins glass filled with ice.
3030.name: Electric Lemonade #1

2756.instructions: Just pour all the contents together, and mix.
2756.name: Jihad

2941.instructions: Scoop two large scoops of vanilla ice-cream into frosted beer mug. Next, add 2 ounces Maker's Mark. Then, pour in coke. Gently stir and enjoy.
2941.name: Brandon and Will's Coke Float

2962.instructions: Fill a glass half full of beer (lighter beer works better). Fill the rest with Ginger Ale or 7-up (preference)
2962.name: Shandy

2783.instructions: Bring water to a boil. Mix with a large package of Black Cherry Jello. Then add Peachtree Schnapps, mix well. Pour into small plastic shot or 2 oz. containers. Chill and enjoy.
2783.name: Jello-shot Supreme

2721.instructions: Mix everything and shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Serve.
2721.name: Shoot

2846.instructions: Stir it together until it just looks like Bailey's.
2846.name: Orgasm a la Denmark

2972.instructions: Fill glass with rocks, add straw before putting in liquor. Then add the ingredients in order, trying to keep layered as much as possible (i.e. Chambord on bottom, then Vodka, Then soda on top).
2972.name: Zipperhead

2911.instructions: Fill to the top of glass with ice cubes or crushed ice. Pour two parts (to taste, of course) vodka, then add mango, orange juice. Add Club Soda to give it a fizz.
2911.name: Mind over Marny

2775.instructions: The Tequila and Whiskey are mixed in the bottom of the shot glass. The Baileys is to act like the 'wax' in a shotgun shell and is layered on top of the whiskey/tequila mix. The fresh ground pepper is your 'buckshot' that creates the spice/burning sensation.
2775.name: Buckshot

2928.instructions: Mix Galiano, Coca-Cola and ice. Float cream on top by pouring over the back of a spoon which is just touching the top of the Coke mixture.
2928.name: Root Beer Float #3

2815.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice. Pour into lowball or other shot glass.
2815.name: Raspberry Kamakazie

2720.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker filled with ice. Strain into a frosted zombie glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry.
2720.name: Jamaican Zombie

2850.instructions: Get a big mug. Pour in one ingredient then the other.
2850.name: Horse Jizz

2889.instructions: Shaken then strained into a Cocktail Glass (Garnish not specified)
2889.name: Harry Denton Martini

2897.instructions: In the shot glass, pour amaretto, then kahlua, then root beer schnapps. Finally float rum on top. Fill a beer mug (with something like bud or coors) half way. Light shot on fire, drop into beer mug and slam as fast as you can! By the way, the faster its slamed, the more it tastes like Dr. Pepper
2897.name: Perfect Flaming Dr. Pepper

2909.instructions: First off, mix the orange juice with the malibu in a seperate glass, pour the firewater in the martini glass, the orange mix over it and when it's settled, pour the vodka slowly over the mixture. If you want you can stir now (in that case the above directions are void) - but i prefer not to. Now's the time for the red wine. It doesn't have to be anything special: I tend to use a Lambrusco because of the pearliness, also the amount of wine you use will affect the taste of the drink immensely. I use between 1/2 cl to 1 cl, not more, other wise the tatse of the wine will dominate too much. To get your optimal taste you'll just have to experiment a little back and forth.
2909.name: Sunny Sex

2804.instructions: For best results mix all ingredients into a frosted Mug.
2804.name: On the Deck

2753.instructions: Mix in the order: cacao, menthe, whiskey, milk. Try to keep the layers separate. Float on the back of a spoon, tilt the glass and pour very gently, etc. I suggest tilting the glass. When you tilt the glass you can, when pouring the cream/milk, rotate the glass causing the cream to swirl down through the other layers which looks good. Serve in an apertif glass.
2753.name: David Caradine

3002.instructions: Shake and Strain, pour into rocks glass, straight up.
3002.name: Gorilla Fart #4

2762.instructions: Mix all ingrediants together except for the Surge and stir. Fill the rest up with Surge and enjoy.
2762.name: Ethnic Sugar

2822.instructions: Mix together in a Tom Collins glass the vodka, tequila, schnapps, Grand Marnier and lime juice over ice. Fill with orange juice.
2822.name: Psycho Citrus

2784.instructions: Pour Mad Dog and Mountain Dew into a glass (plastic beer glasses work the best). Stir. Add a couple ice cubes.
2784.name: Buddy

2891.instructions: Makes 3 shots.Shake ingredients with ice and strain into shot glasses. Savor the scent for a moment and SLAM
2891.name: MVP's Strawberry Bomb

3008.instructions: Slap it in, stir it around and take it down.
3008.name: The Fran

3010.instructions: Bailey's first. Pour Kahlua. Float Everlear. Bottoms up!
3010.name: Easy does it

2910.instructions: Fill glass with ice, add all liquers, top off with cream and shake well.
2910.name: Tattooed Love Goddess

2741.instructions: Mix ingredients in shaker and pour over ice. Serve cold. Great on a hot day!
2741.name: The Black Death

2980.instructions: Pour Midori, triple sec, and rum into a 12 ounce highball glass filled with ice. Fill the rest of the glass with pineapple juice. Stir. Drink.
2980.name: The Nog

2925.instructions: basically put ice in glass, add 1 oz. southern comfort, then fill glass with mountain dew and enjoy!
2925.name: Southern Dew

2774.instructions: Blend all ingredients thoroughly and consume. Put a pair of pink panties on and go out and mow the grass.
2774.name: Butch's Pink Panties

2849.instructions: Mix the whisky and Baileys Cream in a beer-glass (at least 50 cl). Fill the rest of the glass with coffee.
2849.name: H.D.

3012.instructions: Pour rum into shot glass. Add tabasco to the top. Serve room temperature.
3012.name: Satan's Piss

3016.instructions: Mix all ingredients, and pour over ice.
3016.name: Bible Belt

2810.instructions: Layer Drink: Using spoon, pour shot over spoon over glass. Fill with Grenadine first, then Creme de Menthe, and last but not least Tequila. The layers form the mexican flag enjoy.
2810.name: Mexican Flag

3017.instructions: Pour Irish Cream, Vodka, and Bourbon in a glass. Add some ice and mix in the orange juice.
3017.name: Irish Curdling Cow

2940.instructions: Shake all ingredients and serve in shot glass.
2940.name: Romona Banana

2805.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a small or regular size rocks glass.
2805.name: Jamaican Qualude

2998.instructions: In coffee mug (a large one, if you have one) pour Kahlua and Tequila into the bottom. Brew cappuccino per the instructions for your machine. Fill cup with espresso and top with the frothed milk. Enjoy
2998.name: Mexican Cappuccino

2986.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker. Serve with straw and ice cubes, put a cocktail umbrella beside the straw in the glass.
2986.name: Umbrella Man Special

2926.instructions: Shake and strain, pour into collins glass with ice. Garnish with flag.
2926.name: Highlander

2987.instructions: Pour the milk first and then the Irish Cream - the parts are only guesses, I tend to go by color. You want a creamy beige that has only a slight hint of alcohol. Add just enough Creme de Menthe so as to turn the drink slightly green. Stir it up and serve cold.
2987.name: Irish Mint

2906.instructions: Pour bourbon over ice (optional). Add chocolate milk until creamy. The drink of Kings!
2906.name: Velvet Presley

2733.instructions: Pour creme de banana into the glass and layer blue curacao on top.
2733.name: Blue Banana

2943.instructions: Fill a glass with ice. Pour first 3 three ingredients then adjust pineapple juice to taste. Suck it down:)
2943.name: Triplesex

2883.instructions: Add Apple Juice to Goldschlager and Stir.
2883.name: Bitchin' Apple Cider

2933.instructions: Vodka and White first the coffee. The coffee must still be hot
2933.name: Boom box

2917.instructions: Select a bottle (preferably decorative, but not too ornate) that will hold just over 1 liter of liquid. Combine 375ml of each ingredient in the bottle. Marvel at the entrancing color and exquisite character that is The Ale. -- Put the bottle in your freezer and wait 2 hours. -- Pour a shot and hold on to your hat!
2917.name: Real Romulan Ale

3014.instructions: Fill shaker with ice, add ingreidients to taste. Don't want rum to overpower. Shake well, pour into shot glasses.
3014.name: P.M.F.

2737.instructions: Pour 2 oz. Southern Comfort over ice in an 8 oz. glass. Fill with cranberry juice. Squeeze one wedge of lime into drink. Stir and serve.
2737.name: Scarlet O'Hara

2900.instructions: Put gin into a Malt Shaker or something close to that. Stir in the cocoa and sugar. Mix together and shake. Pour into a Champagne Glass.
2900.name: Venom

2942.instructions: Start with half a glass of ice. Fill almost full with root beer and add a little 7-Up. Just stir with a straw or other convenient item. Drink before the ice melts, otherwise it tastes bitter.
2942.name: Mosstrooper

2803.instructions: Layer in Shot Glass, Banded Red/White/Blue shot is perfect for the fourth of July
2803.name: Fourth of July

3005.instructions: dump the shots in glass then fill with oj to taste
3005.name: Electric Screwdriver

2853.instructions: Add Kahlua and Bailey's to shot glass, garnish with whipped cream.
2853.name: Blow Job #3

2847.instructions: Stirr it together until it just looks like dark Bailey's.
2847.name: More Orgasms

2954.instructions: Add wormwood to shot of pernod add sugar and water serve over ice.
2954.name: Apertif d'Absinthe

2966.instructions: Shake all ingredients hard with crushed ice. Serve over crushed ice in a lightly salted margarita glass with two cocktail straws. Garnish with a twist of lime.
2966.name: Golden Margarita

2875.instructions: add ingredients into mixing glass, chill and strain
2875.name: Hazelnut Martini

2890.instructions: Pour the two measures of Schnapps into the cocktail glass. With a cocktail stick stir the liquid whilst adding the two or three dashes of Creme de Menthe. DO NOT mix to hard. Once the Creme de Menthe has started to be added, stop stirring. Finally, gently pour in the lemonade until the glass is topped up. Add maybe a cocktail cherry for decoration.
2890.name: Sizz Snot

2948.instructions: Add some ice. Twist and shake that thing. Serve at once.
2948.name: Malibu Tequichi

2988.instructions: Just mix the two liquids and sprinkle in the cinnamon. Serve either cold or heated.
2988.name: Apple Pie with A Crust

2959.instructions: Mix all ingredients in tall glass. Add more orange soda if it is unpalitable
2959.name: Eliminator

2908.instructions: Use "Green Plastic" Dixie cups 16oz. 2 Ice cubes. Place one shot of 151 into glass Pour Mountain Dew over 151 and ice.
2908.name: DewRunRum

2760.instructions: Place in a cold shaker with ice. Shake for one minute and serve over ice.
2760.name: Tropical Teaser

2789.instructions: Combine Rum, Cream of Coconut and Pineapple Juice in a regular sized blender. Blend on low speed to mix liquid ingredients. Fill blender to top with ice. Blend on high speed until ice is grainy. Pour into hurricane glass and garnish with pineapple wedge.
2789.name: The World's Best Pina Colada

2898.instructions: Mix all ingredients into glass. Enjoy.
2898.name: Extreme Valentine

2730.instructions: Just Mix it and drink it slow!
2730.name: Japanese Slipper #1

2991.instructions: Place a short rock (wide mouthed spirit glass) on bar. Pour the blue curacao, white sambuca and chatreuse into a brandy balloon (snifter). Place the brandy balloon horizontally, balancing on the mouth of the short rock. -- Ignite the alcohol in the brandy balloon. Rotate the brandy balloon (like a cement mixer). Pour mixture from brandy balloon to short rock while it is alight. The stream of alcohol falling between the glasses should form a waterfall of fire cascading into the short rock. (I am a poet also) Use the upside down brandy balloon to suffocate the drink in the short rock. Be sure the flames are out. -- Remove the brandy balloon and inhale the fumes. Shoot the drink. -- Hold on to the bar very tightly!
2991.name: Flaming Moz

2857.instructions: Pour Bitters over rocks, and swirl in a dash of Southern Comfort. Garnish with lemon peel and and an umbrella (or the most frou-frou accoutrement you have on hand)
2857.name: Viscous Robert

2797.instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. This makes one drink.
2797.name: Whitecap Margarita

2828.instructions: Combine all ingredients over ice in a glass.
2828.name: Jack Frost

2831.instructions: Pour eveything in a big punch bowl or cooler with a big block of ice. Throw in some cherries and a half bottle of 151 for good measure. Have a good time!
2831.name: Sunburn

2864.instructions: Fill old-fashioned glass with ice. Pour in grenadine and Amer Picon. Fill glass with soda, leaving room for brandy. Float brandy on top of drink.
2864.name: Amer Picon Punch

2902.instructions: Mix over ice in shaker and strain.
2902.name: Sax with T.

2903.instructions: Add a few ice cubes and fill the glass with ginger ale
2903.name: Be Sweet

2929.instructions: Fill collins glass with ice and add grapefruit juice Shake vodka, lime juice, and triple sec in shaker 1/2-full of ice. Strain on top of grapefruit juice
2929.name: Rosebud

2931.instructions: Pour Gin, Curacao, Pernod and the Juice from 1/2 Lemon into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill up with soda, stir and serve.
2931.name: Painter's Delight

2755.instructions: Shake the three ingredients together and poor in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a red cherry on the rim of the glass.
2755.name: Tropical dream

2936.instructions: Fill cup 2/3rds with Sprite, fill other 1/3 of cup with Peach Schnapps, add ice.
2936.name: FuzzB@ll

2859.instructions: Place cubes in glass, add gin, frozen lime juice, and 7-up then stir and enjoy.
2859.name: Sid's Special

2937.instructions: Mix all ingredients together and shake!!!!
2937.name: Golden Sunrise

2997.instructions: Combine all ingredients in any order, under any conditions, at any place. Drink.
2997.name: Mexican three wise men

2833.instructions: Pour over ice in glass. Shake or stir, add cherry and if you would like an additional splash of color, add a few drops of cherry grenadine.
2833.name: Bigger better Blue Lagoon

2950.instructions: Layer the butterscotch schnapps and Irish Cream by pouring the Irish Cream over the back of a spoon. Spray the Whipped cream on top, pile it about 1-2 inches high. This shot must be taken without using your hands. Pick up the shot glass between your lips and tilt back.
2950.name: Blow Job #2

2744.instructions: Half fill a 20oz glass (preferrably in the shape of a Cowboy Boot) with ice, regular or crushed. Pour the spirits over the ice. Add lemon-lime mix leaving room at the top for the 1/2 oz of Coca-Cola to dirty the drink.
2744.name: Boot Blaster

2944.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker, then strain into chilled glass.
2944.name: SkyLab

2757.instructions: Add all , except the cola, into a flash cup, Flash for 10 sec. or till foamy. Served in beer mug over half mug of ice. Splash of cola top. If you have a chilled mug it's a plus.
2757.name: Jay's Rootbeer Dream

2759.instructions: Pour in order into coffee cup. Top with whipped creme and chocolate shcvings.
2759.name: Almond Chocolate Coffee

2970.instructions: Place all drinks into glass and add ice-cream at the end.
2970.name: Iceberg in Radioactive water

2955.instructions: Pour both ingredients together and mix well. Serve cold.
2955.name: Diablo's Blood

2726.instructions: Pour 1/3 ounce tabasco sauce into a one ounce shot glass. Fill the rest of the shot glass with either HOT 100 or if you prefer you can use a regular cinnamon schnapps. Drink immediately after making. This drink will lose flavor quickly.
2726.name: Brush Fire

2843.instructions: Mix all ingredients in glass & add ice.
2843.name: Rum Runner

2851.instructions: First, have all the ingridients cold. Mix the liquor in a glass and then add the iced tea, coca-cola and lemon. Be sure to stir or shake. Serve chilled in a big (beer?) glass.
2851.name: Long Island Iced Tea #6

2785.instructions: Shake it up it tasts better that way, but you can stir it if you want. 6 of those and you will be wasted for the rest of the night.
2785.name: Absolutly Screwed Up

2912.instructions: Put the milk into a glass and put the Pisang ambong into it also. Shake and serve it cold with ice cubes.
2912.name: Pisang cold

2769.instructions: First, you must pour the Sambuca in your shot glass and then slowly pour the orange juice. You may now enjoy Rick's fruity taste!
2769.name: Rick

2951.instructions: Layer the creme de banane over the melon liqueur. Then drop the Advocaat into the middle of the creme de banane. The Advocaat should hang in the middle if poured correctly.
2951.name: Gorilla Snot #2

2896.instructions: Chill, shake, and strain into shooter glass.
2896.name: Purple Elastic Thunder Fuck

3028.instructions: Pour all ingredients in a mixing tin over ice, stir, and strain into shot glass
3028.name: Bruised Heart

2746.instructions: Ice, then rum, then orange juice. Mix
2746.name: Bastardized Screwdriver

2886.instructions: Line up four shot glasses with a shot of each drink.
2886.name: Three Wise Men (on a farm)

2787.instructions: Mix Tequila, Melon Liquor and Sweet and Sour Mix in Blender. Add ice. Serve in glass.
2787.name: Green Iguana

3001.instructions: Fill the glass with ice. I like to use a standard beer glass. Add about 2 shots of vodka. Then fill the glass about 3/4th of the way with Sprite. Then add just a splash of pineapple juice. Finally, add the Blue Maui until you get a faint (almost skyblue) blue color. Stir.
3001.name: Big Dumb Russian

2830.instructions: Blend with ice and serve in a tall glass. Garnish with chocolate flakes and optionally chocolate topping drizzled down the inside of the glass.
2830.name: Toblerone #1

2895.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shot glass and slam !!!!
2895.name: Arizona Antifreeze

2887.instructions: Add liquors and mixers into shaker with a few cubes of ice. Shake vehemently and strain out ice. Serve as a shooter.
2887.name: Royal Scandal

2907.instructions: Pour 1 shot of your favorite Gin into a highball glass half filled with ice. Add Mountain Dew till glass is almost filled, then give it a splash of Sprite. Stir well, and garnish with a lime wedge.
2907.name: Gin-Dew-It

2841.instructions: add orange juice first, then add vodka, and finally add apple juice and stir lightly. The pooring should do most of the stirring.
2841.name: Screwdriver (modified)

2723.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add Kool-Aid powder, Southern Comfort and Coke. Stir well (never shake)
2723.name: Orange Warthog

2747.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cooler, chill, and serve. As with most punches, it's hard to be specific about the amounts used. A general rule: pour as much of everything as tastes good, then add more vodka! To make life more interesting, throw in pieces of fruit, and add dry ice to the cooler before serving. Small plastic animals also make a nice garnish (but don't drink them)!
2747.name: Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster #3

2781.instructions: Add all ingredients except Meyers dark rum and stir in a hurricane glass filled with ice. Add Meyers dark rum at the top, mix and enjoy!
2781.name: Monsoon

2827.instructions: Add ice cold champagne to glass, slowly add chilled Chambord untill desired raspberry flavor is achieved, give it a gentle stir to mix.
2827.name: Milk of Amnesia

2899.instructions: This is a layered shot - the Bailey's must be on top
2899.name: Dirty Oatmeal

2794.instructions: Add ice to glass. Add Alcohol. Add Sweet and Sour mix. Fill to the top with Cola (preferably Pepsi). Squeeze and add lemon
2794.name: Long Island Iced Tea #5

2865.instructions: Dissolve the sugar in the boiling water and chill in the fridge. This step is best done before the party/drinking session. Put the tequila and lemon juice in the pitcher and fill with soda water and ice. Then mix sugar syrup to taste.
2865.name: Tequila Press

3009.instructions: Pour out 1/4 gallon gatorade, pour in 1/4 gallon vodka. Cap and shake.

2855.instructions: Mix lemonade and water according to instructions on back of can. If the instructions say to add 4 1/3 cans of water do so. Mix into pitcher. Add 1 1/2 cup of Vodka (Absolut). Mix well. Pour into glass of crushed ice. Excellent!
2855.name: Shark Attack

2788.instructions: Mix all three in shaker with ice. Pour cold
2788.name: Chicken Drop

2808.instructions: Combine Vanilla Ice-Cream, Sugar, Ice, and Espresso in a blender and blend until smooth. Add Bailey's Irish Cream and Tia Maria then stir. Pour into coffee mug and serve.
2808.name: Good Morning!

2930.instructions: Measurements made for 1.5 oz. shot glass
2930.name: Golden Nipple

2743.instructions: Shake all with ice, serve in lowball over ice, or neat in a martini glass.
2743.name: Coco Channel

2932.instructions: In a collins glass with ice, pour vodka, midori, and raspberry schnapps. Add a splash of lime juice. Fill 2/3 with sour mix and the rest with soda water (or seltzer). Stir gently, and finally top with a splash of grenadine.
2932.name: Salem Witch

2904.instructions: Fill tin with ice. Mix all three ingredients with ice. Shake and strain into glass.
2904.name: Bazooka Joe

2894.instructions: Pour Crown in first...Then the Kahlua, and Float the Baileys on top. Then Slam!
2894.name: Duck Fart #2

2790.instructions: First and foremost, BUY A NEW GARBAGE CAN, and wash it out thoroughly!!!!! (Preferably the big ones 40-55gal). First Pour in all of the Grain (10 bottles of 1.75ml [Handle]), keep in mind that this recipie is for a Large Party, not 10 people sitting around getting loaded.....Anyway, next add the dry packets of mix. We used to get the largest industrial bags we could, don't go for quality, you're not going to remember anyway. Now this is the most critical part, the fruit. This is why I put this on here...any joker can make punch, but I figured I would distibute my years of fruit research for free....the Best friends you have in the Fruit community are the Orange and the Apple. This is because they absorb the grain better than anything else I tested. So make sure you get some of these in every glass you get, and eat them, DON'T EVER THROW THESE OUT, this is the best part of the drink. Bananas suck, they get gushy, watermelon works ok but the seeds get to be a pain in the ass when you can't see so well, pineapple is good, basically you get the point. Cut the fruit into wedges and throw it in the mix and let it sit around for a minute...Now throw in the bags of ice and fill it up to desired potency with water, mixing can be done with a canoe paddle or a 2x4 or anything else you've got lying around...a disposable camera is usually a good partner while drinking this concoction, people get really outta hand and go off the deep end.....This goes well as an iceblock shot too.
2790.name: Grain Punch

2761.instructions: Pour into mixing cup with 2 or 3 ice cubes, and chill to make shooter. Strain into shot glass or test tube...
2761.name: Greek Lightning

2996.instructions: Blend all ingredients, save nutmeg. Pour into large white wine glass and sprinkle nutmeg on top.

2722.instructions: Pour the vodka and the liqueur in a (long drink) glass with one or two icecubes in it. Fill it up with Schweppes Russchian.

3077.instructions: Build over ice. Garnish with strawberry or cherry.
3077.name: Orgasm #3

3041.instructions: First drink 1/4 of the Sprite and fill up the 1/2l bottle with Hammer Lime vodka and drink!
3041.name: Super Sprite

3148.instructions: Mix all ingredients together. Slowly and gently. Works best if ice is added to punch bowl and soda's are very cold.
3148.name: Brain Fart

3176.instructions: First add vodka to lemaonade, sprite goes in last. Stir.
3176.name: Dirty Mexican Lemonade

3161.instructions: Fill 1/3 of the collins glass with cider, then float the Guinness ontop, to bring the volume to 2/3 full. Pour Bushmill's in a separate shot glass. Drop the shot glass into the collins glass and slam it!
3161.name: Hairball

3140.instructions: Mix all above, pour over ice, and enjoy!!!
3140.name: Juicy Lucy #2

3033.instructions: Pour tequila and Kahlua into glass. Add ice. Fill with cranberry juice and stir with straw. A lemon wedge and umbrella are a nice touch.
3033.name: Rearbuster

3188.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker. Shake well and strain into a rocks glass.
3188.name: Gangbuster Punch

3154.instructions: Mix everything together in a hightumbler glass. Then drink it and get a "ragg"! (Swedish for Pickin up babes)
3154.name: Lina

3056.instructions: In a 2 gallon jug pour in 9oz of marciano cherries and the juice. Then pour in fifth of vodka over cherries and let soak for a few minutes. Then pour in lemon juice and fill jug with sprite. Pour mixture into serving container and strain out cherries. When serving drinks over ice drop cherries in.
3056.name: Pink Panty Pulldowns #2

3160.instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a mixing glass, shake, add more Sloe Gin or Blue Curacao to achieve the desired hue of purple. Strain into an old fashioned glass.
3160.name: Purple Shroud

3136.instructions: Take a glass, pour the Coke in the glass, then you take 7 drops of lemon juice. Granish with a lemon slice on the rim of the glass.
3136.name: Coke and Drops

3045.instructions: Add the ingredients in the order listed in the recipe. Care must be taken when adding the Guinness to prevent an excess of foam. Do Not add ice.
3045.name: Irish Russian

3168.instructions: Put plenty of ice in glass pour rum and everclear first refill with ice - put your tequila, gin, vodka and your blue curraco in. put your pinapple juice in and shake serve with a lemon slice and cherry
3168.name: Skylab Fallout

3121.instructions: Fill blender 1/2 full with ice cubes. Add 6 oz. can of frozen limeade. Add 6 oz. vodka (use limeade can to measure). Add 2 ripe peaches (remove pit and slice). Whip it!
3121.name: Peach Fuzz

3114.instructions: Pour the gin, blue curacao and the tonic water into a highball glass half filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge. If you want, you can add the blue curacao after stiring the drink.
3114.name: Smurf-o-tonic

3129.instructions: Combine all ingredients into a large strainer/mixer. Add a handful of ice. Shake for a few seconds. Strain into a mason jar....
3129.name: Fuzzy Ass

3064.instructions: Add ice cubes to a mason jar glass. Pour 1 oz of each type of rum over ice. Pour 2 oz's of each juice over ice. Add 1 tsp of grenadine. Top with double shot of southern comfort. More juice could be used to mask liquor. Drink can be stirred if preffered.
3064.name: Jet Pilot

3152.instructions: Pour ingredients into mixing cup 1/4 full ice. Stir then pour into shot glasses.
3152.name: Purple Motherfucker #2

3173.instructions: take the galliano and fill one third of the glass. then using a table spoon measure out the bayleys and pour onto the galliano, so that they are seperated. finally, clean the spoon, and measure out the coinraux pour onto the bayleys again so that they are seperated. take a match or lighter and light the cointraux, take a straw and place at bottom of glass and drink.
3173.name: The Feckin Bolox

3190.instructions: Shake and strain. Before serving, moisten the edge of the highball glass and dip in castor sugar.
3190.name: Red Lion

3194.instructions: Pour the Sloe Gin and Amaretto into a glass. Fill the Glass 1/2 way with 7-up (Optional), and the other 1/2 with Orange Juice
3194.name: Field of Green

3197.instructions: Add all the ingredients in a martini shaker with ice. Then shake, pour into martini glass and add a few cranberries to complete the drink.(Soak the cranberries in vodka first)
3197.name: Crantini

3200.instructions: Mix together and server in a pitcher
3200.name: Easy Sweet

3172.instructions: In a glass, put in all liquor and then fill the remaining glass with the kool-aid
3172.name: Slippery Box

3201.instructions: Now stir vigorously and then pour over a large cup of ice. Now drink it with a straw and stir occasionally.
3201.name: Cherry Electric Lemonade

3142.instructions: Pour gin and cranberry into a highball filled with ice cubes. Add grenadine and stir.
3142.name: Ruby Tuesday

3181.instructions: Cut lemons into wedges and mix into large container.
3181.name: Fulminator

3101.instructions: Pour Stoli, Kaluha into highball over ice. Top with Coke and serve.
3101.name: Black Russian #2

3132.instructions: First, fill the champagne flute with heaps of ice. Next, pour in your Schnapps and Midori. Now fill the flute to the top with Champagne. Let the drink settle for a minute (especially if you've been pouring behind a busy, bumpy nightclub!). Use a long bar straw to drink the shot from the bottom up (push the straw right to the bottom of the flute before starting), all at once! Very Important - Don't stop in the middle of the drink!
3132.name: Summer Mind Eraser

3052.instructions: Using a partner of the opposite sex, lick their kneck to moisten. Pour packet of sugar onto their kneck. Place wedge of lemon in their mouth with the skin pointed inward. You first lick the sugar from their kneck, then shoot the vodka, then suck the lemon from their mouth (while gently holding back of their kneck.
3052.name: Body Shot

3095.instructions: Pour the Corona into an 18oz beer glass pour the rum into the beer.
3095.name: Caribbean Boilermaker

3096.instructions: Pour cream soda last: this gives a foam similar to that on an ice cream float.
3096.name: Sweetie

3109.instructions: Pour Kahlua, almost filling shot glass. Then, carefully pour Baileys, using wall of shot glass. This will give the "Guinness" its "head".
3109.name: Baby Guinness

3116.instructions: Layer drink by pouring each shot slowly over the back side of a teaspoon held just above the liquid level.
3116.name: Russian Qualude #3

3174.instructions: Pour in a big glass. Mix. It's best when it's cold and on the rocks.
3174.name: Titty Excreation

3091.instructions: fill glass with ice and build drink top with splash of sour
3091.name: Yellow Parakeet

3189.instructions: Pour gin, then midori, then 7-up (to fill) over ice in a Tom Collins glass. Shake in cocktail shaker, add straw, cherry. Tastes like candy.
3189.name: Pixie Stick

3177.instructions: Fill a shot glass half full with the Bailey's and the rest of the way with the Goldschlager. Mix with toothpick. Then sprinkle a bit of cinnamon on the top and light it with a match (it may take a couple of tries to get it to stay lit). Let it burn for a few seconds and gently blow out the flame being careful not to splash the drink out of the glass. Then, drink!
3177.name: Hot Apple Pie #2

3180.instructions: Pour shots in glass and add Sprite to your taste.
3180.name: Apple Slut

3166.instructions: Pour vidka in blender and add ice crem. Blend. Top with lemonade.
3166.name: Snow Blinder

3094.instructions: Bring to a boil in a saucepan and reduce heat to simmer. Simmer gently for 15 minutes, stirring and muttering appropriate incantations. Serve in ghoulish glasses, garnish with an orange slice if desired.
3094.name: Warm Witch's Blood

3104.instructions: Just mix in the shots of rum, vodka, and tequila. Add splashes of the three juices, heavy on the pineapple. Top off with grenadine. Crushed ice should already be in glass. Top off the glass with a pineapple wedge.
3104.name: Arizona Twister

3035.instructions: Rub the rim of an old fashioned glass with lemon, and dip repeatedly into granulated sugar until it has a good "frosted" rim. Shake a jigger of Amaretto with the juice of 1/2 a lemon. Strain into glass and add ice. Garnish with a Marachino Cherry.
3035.name: A True Amaretto Sour

3150.instructions: Into a shot glass layer the Crown Royal on top of the Frangelico.
3150.name: Royal Bitch

3031.instructions: Add all ingredients in collins glass with ice and stir.
3031.name: Gideon's Green Dinosaur

3043.instructions: Mix it half and half and serve chilled. Enjoy!
3043.name: Rumka

3159.instructions: Pour in the vodka first and then proceed to pour the beer on top.
3159.name: Dogs Bollocks

3103.instructions: No mixing, just pour in in any order.
3103.name: Sex on the Beach #11

3149.instructions: combine in shaker. shake vigorously. strain into cocktail glass
3149.name: Black Martini #2

3058.instructions: In a shaker mix Spiced Rum, Kahlua, and Cream. Pur into a Mason Jar filled with ice and add a splach of Coca-Cola. Garnish with a couple of Filberts.
3058.name: Colorado Pitbull

3151.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into glass Decorate with slice of Orange, Pineapple and a red Cocktial cherry.
3151.name: Psycho

3145.instructions: fill glass with ice pour creme de cacao and the creme de menthe over ice. stir and enjoy. Is best after dinner but can be enjoyed anytime.
3145.name: Peppermint Pattie

3125.instructions: Layer each ingredient starting with Kahlua, then Bailey's and finish with the Banana liqueur. If you have difficulty layering the shooter (shot) use a tea spoon held upside down and poor over slowly.
3125.name: Flying Monkey

3112.instructions: Mix all ingredients in tin over ice. Strain into shot glasses and enjoy!!!!
3112.name: G. T. O.

3057.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour in Chambord, then fill with Zima. Mix and enjoy.
3057.name: Zima Blaster

3089.instructions: Shake all the ingrediants together and serve in a chilled glass.
3089.name: Witch's Brew

3092.instructions: In a 1 to 2 quart pan, bring 1 cup of cranberry juice and candied ginger to a boil over high heat. Boil, uncovered, about 2 minutes, set aside. With a vegetable peeler, pare peel (colored part only) from oranges: cut peel into thin 2 in long worms: or use an Oriental shredder to make long shreds. Add orange peel to cranberry mixture. Cover and chill at least 4 hours or as long as overnight. Juice oranges: put juice in a 6 to 8 quart pan or heavy bowl. Stir in cranberry-ginger mixture, the 3 cups cranberry juice, apple concentrate, limeade, grapes and water. If made ahead, cover and chill up to 2 hours. Add ginger ale and about a 1 pound piece of dry ice (DO NOT put small pieces in punch or cups): ice should smolder at least 30 minutes. Ladle into cups. Add any remaining ice when bubbling ceases.
3092.name: Eerie Witch's Brew

3073.instructions: fill collins glass with ice pour in rum and blue curacao pour in sweet & sour mix splash cola lemon twist garnish
3073.name: Electric Lemonade #2

3117.instructions: Whisk with a fork, untill all mixed in. Add cream after mixing.
3117.name: The Italian Job

3135.instructions: Shake VERY,VERY,VERY well in a shaker with lots of ice. leave the ice in the shaker, not in the drink. can be served with a red cherry in it.
3135.name: Dolphin's Foam

3170.instructions: Fill the glass with the amount of Tia Maria you would like and put an equal amount, or a little more, of milk. Add two ice cubes and down.
3170.name: Brown Cow #2

3075.instructions: Shake or blend until frothy, then pour over ice and garnish with toasted coconut.
3075.name: Coconut Frappe

3108.instructions: Pour all into any kind of glass, mix with small stick and add a slice of orange and a cherry in glass.
3108.name: Nelson special

3040.instructions: Shake all ingredients on ice and strain.
3040.name: Kool-Aid (Boulder style)

3097.instructions: Pour Vodka, Gin and lime cordial into glass, and top up with crushed ice. Wait for ice to melt slightly and sip without a straw.
3097.name: Army special

3067.instructions: For the full effect you should use a large Folgers coffee can or a metal bucket. First, fill the can half full with ice and add the gin(the whole bottle). Next, add the concentrates and cherries. Finally, shake the can until its ready to drink.
3067.name: Gin Bucket

3071.instructions: Just add "EVERYTHING" except the Peach Schnapps into the MUG, Lightly stir and then add as much ice (smallest cubes possible) you can fit in. NOTE: Leave just enough room at the top for the 1/4 oz. of Peach Schnapps.
3071.name: Miami Ice

3078.instructions: Build over ice. Garnish with strawberries or cherries.
3078.name: Multiple Orgasm #1

3044.instructions: Shake Vodka, Bailey's and Blue Curacao with ice. Pour into glass and fill up with 7-UP.
3044.name: Aqua

3074.instructions: Dissolve sugar in 2 cups of boiling water and add corn syrup. Dissolve the instant coffee in the remaining water. Pour syrup and coffee in a gallon jug. Let it cool. Add vodka and vanilla when cold. For the best result, let the mixture "mature" for 4-5 weeks.
3074.name: Homemade Kahlua

3111.instructions: Add gin, cointrean and lemon juice to a shaker filled with ice shake hard (30 seconds) and serve up in a cocktail glass with lemon twist as garnish
3111.name: Delilah

3126.instructions: Add vodka to glass over ice. Then add water and lemon lime mix. Stir until all is dissolved.
3126.name: Antifreeze #2

3049.instructions: Pour vodka in glass followed by the Kahlua. Add the dash of coke (to taste) and stir. Top up the glass with guinness and serve.
3049.name: Smooth Black Russian

3158.instructions: Add blue raspberry to ice, add vanilla, pinapple, and coconut, then blend. Add tequila, blend again. Whipped cream on top optional.
3158.name: Wet Snatch

3171.instructions: Combine over ice, strain into shot glass.
3171.name: Silk Panties

3062.instructions: Take pitcher. Fill pitcher with bottle of Tom Collins mix. Add everclear to "taste" or 8 oz. if you are a stickler for recipes. Add ice. Get drunk.
3062.name: Mortuary Mix

3120.instructions: Mix Beer, Soda, and frozen lemonade into a large pitcher. Then fill empty lemon aid container with vodka and add to mixture. Stir.
3120.name: Elmer Fudpucker

3124.instructions: 2 shots of vodka, 2 shots of Peach Schnapps. Fill the rest with Ginger Ale, Lemonade, and OJ to taste
3124.name: Fuzzy Cooter

3184.instructions: In a shaker, mix all ingredients, shake well. Serve over ice, garnish with a lime wedge (optional)
3184.name: The Party Girl

3113.instructions: For an extra kick, use Bacardi 151. If you want a lime taste, use Bacardi Limon.
3113.name: Rum and Coke

3053.instructions: Ice Cocktail glass. Add Vodka and mixers. Fill with sour mix and shake because of sour mix.
3053.name: Kamikaze Version

3032.instructions: Pick a highball glass and add som ice. Pour 2 cl of vodka. Add 1 cl of Rose's lime juice. Fill up with equal amounts of grape tonic and orange juice. Add a straw, stir and serve.
3032.name: Stan's Surprise

3079.instructions: Build over ice. Granish with strawberries or cherries.
3079.name: Screaming Multiple Orgasm

3118.instructions: Pour 3/4 shot of Tequila in shot glass, top off with lime juice, splash in tabasco sauce, and shoot.
3118.name: Texas Prairie Fire

3072.instructions: Pour tequila into shot glass. Fill the rest of glass with 7-up. Cover top of glass with hand and slam hard onto counter or bar. This causes shot to fizz, so drink quickly!
3072.name: Popper

3065.instructions: Pour the corona into an 18oz beer glass pour the bacardi limon into the beer stir very gently
3065.name: Buccaneer

3076.instructions: Layer each ingredient into a Sherry Glass in order as listed. Indulge in this creamy minty flavour!
3076.name: Blow Job #4

3146.instructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender on high until ice is finely crushed. It should be of a slushy consistency. Pour immediately and serve.
3146.name: Arctic Mouthwash

3157.instructions: Mix the Vodka, 7-up & Soda in that order. Add lemon juice. Add salt gradually until the sweet taste of 7-up just disappears.
3157.name: Nan's special

3179.instructions: Mix all ingredients, and pour over ice if desired.
3179.name: Bend Me Over

3196.instructions: Shake ingredients in bartender's mixer quickly, just 5 shakes. Strain out ice, serve in glass immediately with a slice of orange.
3196.name: Amaretto Sunset

3060.instructions: Add 3/4 jigger of Schnapps then layer cranberry juice on top. May take a few "practice" shots to find the right amounts of each.
3060.name: Cherry Cheesecake
